"[71-vincent] [They]1970-they found [the union - jack of paths]1971-the union - jack of paths obliterated by [an orderly crowd]1972-an orderly crowd ; for every hour , almost every minute , of the day had brought fresh units to [that weary - footed , eager - eyed host of pilgrims]1973-that weary - footed , eager - eyed host of pilgrims . Here and there amongst [them]1970-they was to be seen the high - twined , badge - set turban of [a policeman , ready , truncheon in hand , to assert the rights of law]1974-a policeman , ready , truncheon in hand , to assert the rights of law , but not many ; since the rush of [bathers]1975-bathers had not yet come , and there was small danger to be feared from anything save that keen desire to be cleansed , which showed on almost every face . As [the two Englishmen]456-the two englishmen entered , however , followed by [Roshan Khân]89-roshan , on whose features that fierce intolerance of [his]89-roshan race for [idolaters]1977-idolaters was written clearly , a murmur of tense anticipation ran through [the packed courtyard]1978-the packed courtyard . The miracle turn was evidently on . It was . [Jogi Gorakh - nâth]141-jogi gorakh - nâth lay as if dead on the raised stone platform in front of the gun , and [two assistants]1979-two assistants were prodding [him]141-jogi gorakh - nâth with pins . " [I]71-vincent 've seen that in [London]34-london , "[71-vincent] said [Vincent]71-vincent , forcing [his]71-vincent way rapidly through [the yielding crowd]1980-the yielding crowd , " so [I]71-vincent can hardly object to it [here]3395-here ; but if there is [hanky - panky]4730-hanky - panky with [my]71-vincent gun-- "[71-vincent] At that instant , a bloody dagger , fresh apparently from the jogi 's heart , was held up , and a curious hush fell on [the courtyard]386-the courtyard . It was broken by a muffled voice , unmistakably from within the gun , and that was lost in a great roar of applause . " A miracle ! a miracle of [the gods]3472-the gods ! "[71-vincent] [Captain Dering]71-vincent , who with [the others]3977-the others had now reached the centre , waited for the roar to subside a little , and then [his]71-vincent voice rose and seemed to crush it . " [Risaldar]92-risaldar - sahib [You]92-risaldar have the key of the padlock . Take out the tampion , and see who is inside . "[71-vincent] As [he]71-vincent spoke , [his]71-vincent eyes were on [the assistants]1983-the assistants , and something in [their]1983-the assistants defiant assurance warned [him]71-vincent that [he]71-vincent was on the wrong tack , and made [him]71-vincent cover possible discomfiture with the words,--"If there is [no one]3741-no one , then [someone here]4733-someone here has the art of throwing [his]4733-someone here voice where [he]4733-someone here will . "[71-vincent] As if in assent , the muffled blessing came , louder , this time , from the now un - tampioned gun , so that [Roshan]89-roshan 's face showed somewhat scared , as , with a salute , [he]71-vincent announced as the result of [his]71-vincent inspection , " There is [no one]3741-no one , [sir]3491-sir , [I]71-vincent can see clear down the metal , but -- but the voice is there . "[71-vincent] A sound of such fierce approval ran through [the crowd who were within hearing]1984-the crowd who were within hearing , that [Captain Dering]71-vincent saw instantly that it would not be wise to court another failure . " Close up the gun again , "[71-vincent] [he]71-vincent said loudly . " So long as [my]71-vincent orders are not disobeyed , and [people]3436-people keep [their]3436-people bodies out of [my]71-vincent gun , [their]3436-people voices are welcome to it ! Come along , [Carlyon]68-lance , "[71-vincent] [he]71-vincent added , in English , " it 's ventriloquism , of course , and [I]71-vincent 'd dearly like to catch the beast who does it , but [we]4737-we had better leave it alone for the present . "[71-vincent] [Lance]68-lance , who , in sudden remembrance of the sound [he]68-lance had heard as [he]68-lance drifted past the bathing - steps in [his]68-lance canoe on the night of the dance , had been vainly overhauling the padlock and chain for signs of [their]1985-their having been tampered with , nodded [his]68-lance head , and let the chain swing back on its staple . The sudden jerk threw a new light on the matter . For the staple came out , disclosing the fact that it had been neatly filed through at the shank , and then replaced by means of a drilled hole and a pin . The proof of tampering was clear , but nothing else . " [I]68-lance have it , "[68-lance] said [Lance]68-lance suddenly coming up with a red but triumphant face from a prolonged inspection down the huge muzzle , " [they]1985-their 've shoved in a false end , and there 's [someone]498-someone behind . [Roshan]89-roshan ! go back and fetch [me]68-lance [my]68-lance long gaff , and [Roshan]89-roshan -- [my]68-lance cleaning rod . "[68-lance] " And tell [the guard]4739-the guard to come out at once , "[71-vincent] added [Captain Dering]71-vincent , heedful of the rising note of movement amongst [the crowd]4412-the crowd , sign that it was growing restless . " Stay ! [I]68-lance 've got a ripping idea ! "[68-lance] cried [Lance]68-lance again , [his]68-lance face all abeam with delight -- delight so catching that [the crowd]4412-the crowd stilled as [he]68-lance turned to it . " Look here , "[68-lance] [he]68-lance said confidentially , in Hindustani , " there 's [a boy in this gun]4740-a boy in this gun . [It]4740-a boy in this gun must be [a boy]523-a boy , and rather a small one , for there is n't room for anything big . Now is n't there [a boy anywhere about the same size]4742-a boy anywhere about the same size who 'd like to come and draw [him]4740-a boy in this gun ? [He]4740-a boy in this gun will be heads this way , and [you]4743-you will be able to get a good grip of [his]4740-a boy in this gun hair , and [he]4740-a boy in this gun will get a grip of [your]4743-you 's , and -- and it will be -- be jolly ! "[68-lance] The untranslatable word needed no translation . That something in the perfection of careless youth which touches the hearts of [all mankind]1988-all mankind , put [Lance]68-lance and [[his]68-lance audience]1989-his audience in touch instantly . [A group of tall , grave - eyed Sikhs]1990-a group of tall , grave - eyed sikhs laughed uproariously , and nudged [a lad beside [them]1990-a group of tall , grave - eyed sikhs]1991-a lad beside them . " Go on , [brotherling]4744-brotherling , "[1990-a group of tall , grave - eyed sikhs] [they]1990-a group of tall , grave - eyed sikhs said , " [thou]4745-thou art [the best wrestler of the school]4746-the best wrestler of the school . Go ! show [the Huzoor]90-huzoor how [thou]4745-thou canst hold [thine]4745-thou own . "[1990-a group of tall , grave - eyed sikhs] It needed no more . " Yea ! try [thy]4745-thou luck , [brotherling]4744-brotherling , "[1992-a dozen voices] said [a dozen voices]1992-a dozen voices , " and if [thou]4745-thou canst not [we]4748-we will find [a champion]4749-a champion ! "[1992-a dozen voices] That settled it . Five minutes afterwards [Lance Carlyon]68-lance found [himself]68-lance arranging the conditions of the draw , surrounded by [half a dozen lads]1993-half a dozen lads , each backed by [eager supporters]1994-eager supporters . By this time [Roshan]89-roshan had returned , and with the aid of the gaff and [one of the smallest of [the guard]4739-the guard]1995-one of the smallest of the guard , [Lance]68-lance 's guess had been proved to be true . A neatly fitting disc of metal , cup - shaped to increase the resemblance to the end of the barrel had been withdrawn , leaving a head visible . " It is beautifully tousled , and [you]1997-the sikh champion 'll get a good grip , "[68-lance] said [Lance]68-lance , regretfully , as [he]68-lance helped [the Sikh champion]1997-the sikh champion into the gun , " but it is bigger than [I]68-lance thought for , and [you]1997-the sikh champion 'll have [your]1997-the sikh champion work cut out for [you]1997-the sikh champion . "[68-lance] Then ensued the quaintest scene imaginable . [The whole crowd]1998-the whole crowd , but five minutes before ready , almost , to fight for the truth of [their]1998-the whole crowd miracle , were swaying breathless , excited , in sheer childish delight over the tussle to expose it . " [Lo]123-lo ! [he]1997-the sikh champion comes -- [I]68-lance see [his]1997-the sikh champion toes -- bravo , [Gurdit]236-gurdit ! Nay , [the other hath strength left]4750-the other hath strength left ! [Sho]237-sho ! [sonling]4751-sonling , let not go for [thy]4751-sonling life ! That is well done -- Bravo ! [Bravo]4752-bravo ! "[68-lance] So backwards and forwards , like a terrier and a badger , the draw wavered , [Lance]68-lance , watch in hand , calling time . " Half a minute more ! Go it , [Gurdit]236-gurdit ! "[68-lance] [he]68-lance shouted . The encouragement had its effect . [Gurdit]236-gurdit 's toes , [his]236-gurdit ankles , [his]236-gurdit calves showed beyond the gun ; only [his]236-gurdit knees remained , giving [him]236-gurdit grip still . " Wait for [his]236-gurdit knees . Wait till [he]236-gurdit loses grip ! "[68-lance] shouted [Lance--"twenty]238-lance--"twenty seconds more -- fifteen , ten -- f -- there [you]236-gurdit are ! that 's it , fair ! ! "[68-lance] Fair it was ; the knees , pressing outwards steadily , every bronze muscle of them showing the strength of the drag , lost grip , and with a great yell of delight , [half - a - dozen bearded Sikhs]1999-half - a - dozen bearded sikhs had hold of [Gurdit]236-gurdit 's feet with such a vigorous pull , that [Lance]68-lance had to shove [his]68-lance knee forward , in a hurry , to prevent [the boy]4584-the boy from falling on [his]4584-the boy face ; since both [his]68-lance hands were locked desperately in the tangled hair of a disciple so big that [he]4584-the boy came out of the gun with a cloop like a cork ! " It was the most sporting draw [I]68-lance 've seen for years , "[68-lance] said [Lance]68-lance enthusiastically , when , after much laughter and congratulation , [the crowd]4412-the crowd parted with smiles to let [the Englishmen]2002-the englishmen pass , " and [I]4412-the crowd 'm glad [you]236-gurdit let [the beggar]4753-the beggar off , [Dering]71-vincent . It was n't [his]4753-the beggar fault , and [he]4753-the beggar must have been beastly uncomfortable . Now , if [you]236-gurdit could have quodded [the jogi--]4754-the jogi-- "[4412-the crowd] " [I]71-vincent hope to do that by and by , "[71-vincent] replied [Vincent]71-vincent significantly , " but it was just as well [the crowd]4412-the crowd should laugh to - day . These religious gatherings are always a bit risky -- and , as [you]236-gurdit know , [Dillon]69-dr. dillon is having trouble over at [the gaol]1501-the gaol . ' Pon [my]71-vincent soul , [I]71-vincent do n't know which is worst to manage -- [fifteen hundred scoundrels]4757-fifteen hundred scoundrels , or [a hundred and fifty thousand saints]4758-a hundred and fifty thousand saints . "[71-vincent] " A hundred and fifty ! "[68-lance] echoed [Lance]68-lance , " will there be as many as that ? "[68-lance] " Quite . So it is as well [they]2003-the many should laugh ; for even with the extra contingent of [police]4759-police [we]4760-we should find it a bit hard to manage [them]2003-the many if [they]2003-the many did n't . "[71-vincent] True ; but unfortunately the laughter of [the many]2003-the many involves the discomfiture of [the few]2004-the few ; and in this case , [these]2005-i were [the most unscrupulous men in [Eshwara]1-eshwara]2006-the most unscrupulous men in eshwara . " If [I]2005-i were [a man]533-a man -- [I]2005-i would fight . " [My]71-vincent sword is always at the service of [the ladies]4762-the ladies . "[71-vincent] Then a certain feeling , as of electricity in the air , a certain look on the faces round [him]71-vincent -- for [most of [the mission workers]2011-the mission workers]2010-most of the mission workers had already arrived -- warned [him]71-vincent that this was no jesting matter , and [he]71-vincent continued in better taste , " [I]71-vincent trust there is nothing wrong ? "[71-vincent] " Wrong ! "[105-erda] Here [Dr. James Campbell]154-dr. campbell , who had been laying down the law to [a group of other black coats]2012-a group of other black coats , came up and put the telegram [he]154-dr. campbell was holding into [Captain Dering]71-vincent 's hand . Feeling was running high in many ways , and it was necessary to be extremely cautious . " [I]71-vincent can assure [you]1009-the commissioner , [sir]3491-sir , "[71-vincent] said [Vincent]71-vincent , handing back the telegram , " [I]1009-the commissioner am not [the informant]4766-the informant . [[Our]4768-we government]4769-our government is neutral-- "[4427-magistrate] " Neutral ! "[190-david] interrupted [the Reverend David Campbell]190-david , whose blonde face was flushed with excitement . " If it were neutral [we]4768-we would not complain . But does this prohibition extend to [the priests of other religions]4770-the priests of other religions ? No ! a thousand times , no ! "[71-vincent] " And [we]4768-we are [soldiers]4773-soldiers too , "[154-dr. campbell] said [Dr. Campbell]154-dr. campbell , weightily , " and [our]4768-we orders are to be instant in season and out of season . "[154-dr. campbell] A little murmur of approval ran through [the company]4316-the company . "[152-mrs. campbell] So did [some of [the men]2022-the men]2021-some of the men , notably [David Campbell]190-david , who passed from [one group]2023-one group to another , [his]190-david pale blue eyes a - glisten with enthusiasm . " It is a pity [you]105-erda have n't got [Jean Ziska]184-jean ziska 's drum , [Miss Shepherd]105-erda , "[190-david] [he]190-david said . " By [Jove]76-jove ! how [you]105-erda would bang it ! "[190-david] " There can scarcely , [Sir Lancelot,"--she]239-sir lancelot,"--she[190-david] paused on the title with a strain after contempt which did not somehow come off,--"be a question as to right or wrong in this case . "[190-david] [He]190-david gave a kindly , almost indulgent laugh . " There never can be , really , of course . [One]3501-one is bound to be right , the other wrong . Now [I]190-david expect [the sixty thousand nobles]4775-the sixty thousand nobles , and [the grand - master who were left dead on the field]4776-the grand - master who were left dead on the field , and [the two thousand poor devils who got drowned in [the river]333-the river]4777-the two thousand poor devils who got drowned in the river besides , and [all the others]4779-all the others -- [you]105-erda know about ['em]4780-'em , of course , and [you]105-erda must admit [he]4780-'em was [a bloodthirsty chap]4781-a bloodthirsty chap at any rate!--had got a musical instrument of some sort , too . "[190-david] " And [I]2024-she hear it , too , "[2024-she] [she]2024-she said superbly , with all the more defiance , because [his]2025-he words touched [her]2024-she innate sense of justice , as they did so often . " That is n't it , anyhow , is it , [Miss Shepherd]105-erda ? "[2025-he] [he]2025-he said . " [I]2029-i saw that drum - banger as [I]2029-i came past just now -- the funniest old dried stick of [a Brahmin [you]105-erda ever set eyes on]4783-a brahmin you ever set eyes on . And [you]105-erda know those ' round the mulberry bush , ' fairy - ring , endless circles of [men]312-men and [women]479-women hand in hand [we]4786-we used to cut out of newspaper when [we]4786-we were [kids]4787-kids ? Well , [he]2025-he was using gilt paper , and trying to make a miracle out of the ' biz ' ! [One god]4788-one god , [he]2025-he said , in many ; the outline being the same , and the eye of faith sufficient to fill in the details of divinity ! [The people]3552-the people were buying [them]3552-the people by dozens for the half of nothing . [I]2029-i asked ['em]3552-the people why , and [they]3552-the people said as toys for [[their]3552-the people children]4790-their children . So [I]2029-i expect it will be the endless circle of [boys]1382-boys and [girls]4271-girls again -- don't [you]2030-her ? For , [you]2030-her know , "[2029-i] [he]2029-i went on in the confidential voice which , dimly , [she]2030-her recognized was for [her]2030-her alone , " [I]2029-i 've never been able to find out the least difference in [kids]4787-kids . [I]2029-i talk to [the little beggars]4794-the little beggars when [I]2029-i 'm out shooting , [you]2030-her know , and -- well ! [the boys]1825-the boys are just as much [boys]1382-boys as [I]2029-i used to be-- "[2029-i] Used to be ! Yet once again , for the hundredth time at least since [they]2031-they had first met , barely a month ago , [his]2029-i youth , [his]2029-i boyish , whole - hearted , healthy zest in life made [her]2030-her eyes soft ; made [her]2030-her feel , with all the true womanhood in [her]2030-her that , if [she]2030-her ever had [a son]1375-a son , [she]2030-her prayed [he]1375-a son might be like this . And something else [she]2030-her recognized -- not for the first time , either ; namely , that boyish , almost thoughtless as [he]2029-i was , puzzling [himself]2029-i not at all with the problems of life , [you]2033-you could never dip below the surface without finding [him]2029-i , as it were , there before [you]2033-you ; finding [him]2029-i clear - eyed , ready to treat the shady side of things as [he]2029-i treated the light side ; that is , with an absolutely limpid honesty . So , as [she]2030-her stood silent , checked in [her]2030-her desire to check , [Father Ninian]81-father ninian , who had just entered with [Laila]86-laila , came up to greet [her]2030-her , and having done so , turned to [Lance]68-lance with kind eyes and voice . " [Captain Dering]71-vincent has just told [me]2034-i that [we]4797-we have to call [you]68-lance [Sir Lancelot Carlyon]68-lance . [I]2034-i am sorry for the cause , since [[your]68-lance uncle]4211-your uncle was [a man who made [the world]404-the world better by being in [it;--as]42-it;--as]4799-a man who made the world better by being in it;--as -- as [you]68-lance will . It is a fine old name , [Sir Lancelot]68-lance ! It carries with it a fine inheritance of honour ; therefore [I]2034-i can wish no better wish for [the world]404-the world , as well as for [yourself]68-lance , than that [you]68-lance may hand it on to [[your]68-lance son]4802-your son . So , peace be with [you]68-lance ! "[2034-i] [His]2034-i clasped hands unfolded themselves for a space as [he]2034-i passed on , leaving [those two]1341-those two once more standing together with that sense of being singled out for friendship which had come to [them]1341-those two in the beginning . And this was to be the end of it ? Even to [her]2036-her it seemed impossible . To [him]2034-i it made the impossibility certain . " [Miss Shepherd]105-erda , "[2034-i] [he]2034-i said suddenly , " [I]2034-i have something [I]2034-i must say to [you]105-erda this afternoon . "[2034-i] There was so much of command in [his]2034-i voice that [she]2036-her might have resented it , had not [Father Ninian]81-father ninian 's voice risen at that moment ; firmly , yet with its usual faint hesitancy , in words which made [everyone in the room]2037-everyone in the room pause to listen . " [I]2034-i , and [I]2034-i only , am responsible , [Dr. Campbell]154-dr. campbell . [I]2034-i gave [the Commissioner]1009-the commissioner the information on which [he]1009-the commissioner has acted , "[2034-i] here [he]2034-i raised [his]2034-i hand against interruption . " [I]2034-i have been fifty years at [Eshwara]1-eshwara ; fifty times have [I]2034-i seen [the pilgrims]3444-the pilgrims pass to [the ' Cradle of [the Gods]166-the gods]3399-the ' cradle of the gods ' listening peacefully to [your]154-dr. campbell preaching . But this year there is something new . "[2034-i] [He]2034-i paused to put on [his]2034-i spectacles , yet the keenness they brought to [his]2034-i face was dimmed by wistfulness . " [I]2034-i can not quite tell what it is . There is something beyond the things [I]2034-i know , though these are many -- small , it is true , but cumulative . Still , this is certain ; the pulse of [the people]3552-the people beats irregularly to - day , and that means danger to the body corporate . It may pass ; yet the faintest stimulus may upset the whole balance of [the organism]4808-the organism . So , [[my]2034-i friends]4809-my friends , as [our]4810-we cause is eternal , as [we]4810-we have time-- "[2034-i] " Time ! "[190-david] interrupted [David Campbell]190-david , passionately , " but now is the appointed time . Think , [sir]3491-sir , how many of [these poor deluded souls]4812-these poor deluded souls , striving after salvation , may die upon the road to [[their]4812-these poor deluded souls false gods]4813-their false gods -- [none]403-none can know how many better than [you]3491-sir , who-- "[190-david] [The old priest]1250-the old priest looked at [the young one]2039-the young one with a whole lifetime of sad wisdom in [his]2034-i face . " Yes ! "[190-david] [he]190-david said , softly , " for [I]190-david am very old . [I]190-david have seen [half a world]4815-half a world die upon [its]4815-half a world road to [the ' Cradle of [the Gods]166-the gods]3399-the ' cradle of the gods . ' Die -- though [we]4810-we have not the courage to say so,--with [their]4812-these poor deluded souls faces set to the eternal goal of humanity ; to the finding of something [we]4810-we have lost . And something keeps [us]4810-we all back . What is it ? Have [we]4810-we the secret more than [they]4812-these poor deluded souls , who say , as [we]4810-we do , that it is sin ? "[190-david] [His]1250-the old priest voice had fallen into a strangely musical rhythm , so that [Dr. Campbell]154-dr. campbell 's , following it , seemed harsh indeed . " [We]4810-we know [we]4810-we have . [We]4810-we have the certainty -- [we]4810-we are [missionaries of that certainty--]4817-missionaries of that certainty-- "[154-dr. campbell] " And [I]81-father ninian -- to [my]81-father ninian shame be it said , "[81-father ninian] interrupted [Father Ninian]81-father ninian , with a curious return to worldly courtesy as [he]81-father ninian removed [his]81-father ninian spectacles , " have never tried to make [a convert]4818-a convert ; therefore [I]81-father ninian can scarcely hope to persuade [you]2040-his younger , less experienced colleagues ; but if , [gentlemen]4437-gentlemen , [I]81-father ninian might be allowed to talk the matter over with [you--]2040-his younger , less experienced colleagues "[81-father ninian] " A most sensible suggestion , "[154-dr. campbell] assented [Dr. Campbell]154-dr. campbell , looking round on [[his]154-dr. campbell younger , less experienced colleagues]2040-his younger , less experienced colleagues ; " [I]154-dr. campbell should be loth to act hastily , and give occasion to [the scoffer]4820-the scoffer . [Mamma]240-mamma , will [you]240-mamma send [our]4821-our tea into [the dining room]4822-the dining room ? "[154-dr. campbell] The pure practicality of the last words seemed to relieve the general tension , and [Vincent Dering]71-vincent -- who had been looking horribly bored -- seeing the piano open , sat down to it , as [the dissentients]2041-the dissentients moved off into [[their]2041-the dissentients cave of [Adullam]43-adullam]2042-their cave of adullam , and began to play , " La Donna é mobile ; "[2041-the dissentients] saying , with a laugh:-- " [Cherchez la femme]4823-cherchez la femme ! Depend upon it , [Mrs. Campbell]152-mrs. campbell , there is [a woman at the bottom of it]4824-a woman at the bottom of it . [I]2041-the dissentients know from personal experience that [she]4824-a woman at the bottom of it is always fatal to [my]2041-the dissentients peace and pulse on [any road]4825-any road . "[2041-the dissentients] [Erda Shepherd]105-erda , holding [her]105-erda head very high , crossed over to pour out the tea ; whereupon [Vincent]71-vincent , being mischievously inclined , suddenly changed the tune to " Where'er [you]4826-you walk , "[71-vincent] which [he]71-vincent played daintily , purely , altogether charmingly , so causing [Muriel Smith]151-muriel , who had lately joined the party , to relax [her]151-muriel faint frown at [his]71-vincent remark . " [Miss Shepherd]105-erda objects , "[71-vincent] [he]71-vincent went on provokingly . " [She]105-erda does n't believe in [men]312-men fighting for [women]479-women . [She]105-erda scorned the offer of [my]71-vincent sword in favour -- excuse [me]71-vincent for having overheard -- of some drum or another . What was it , [Miss Shepherd]105-erda ? " [I]105-erda was only alluding to [Jean Ziska]184-jean ziska 's drum , which was sounded to call [the Hosts of [the Lord]3426-the lord to arms]4829-the hosts of the lord to arms . "[105-erda] [Mrs. Campbell]152-mrs. campbell gave a fine , hearty shudder . " [[My]152-mrs. campbell dear]823-my dear , "[152-mrs. campbell] [she]152-mrs. campbell said , " why can [ye]823-my dear not leave that gruesome tale alone ? For it 's just an awful tale , [Mrs. Smith]75-mrs. smith . As if [he]68-lance could not be content with doing [his]68-lance duty in this life , but must leave [his]68-lance skin behind for [the next generation]4832-the next generation . "[152-mrs. campbell] " [We]4833-we have biblical warranty for that sort of thing , [Mrs. Campbell]152-mrs. campbell , "[2043-the sharp - voiced lady who owned the small black coat] said [the sharp - voiced lady who owned the small black coat]2043-the sharp - voiced lady who owned the small black coat . "[152-mrs. campbell] There was always something about [the good lady]3953-the good lady 's comfortable common - sense which made further discussion difficult , and the talk wandered into [less rugged paths]2045-less rugged paths until , the time for leisure from [Erda]105-erda 's duties as [tea - maker]2046-tea - maker being close at hand , [Lance]68-lance went out deliberately into [the verandah]3965-the verandah which overhung [the river]333-the river , or rather [the spit of sand - bank]2049-the spit of sand - bank which jutted out from this , the turning - point of [[the city]3556-the city 's triangle]607-the city 's triangle . On the right , the wall , set with [its]2052-its temple spires , trended away to meet [the bridge]373-the bridge , on the left to join the line of [the palace]3477-the palace , the bathing - steps , [the Fort]3493-the fort . In front of [him]68-lance , as [he]68-lance stood leaning over the balustrade at the western end of [the verandah]3965-the verandah , lay dull streaks of sand , bright gleams of water , and beyond them -- dim , mysterious -- was [the great level plain of [India]8-india]2057-the great level plain of india , on whose scarce [distinguishable edge the sun was setting behind a bank of deep purple cloud]2058-distinguishable edge the sun was setting behind a bank of deep purple cloud . [It]2057-the great level plain of india was [a long , low , almost level bank]2059-a long , low , almost level bank , outlined sharply against [the sea of golden - green light above]2060-the sea of golden - green light above [it]2057-the great level plain of india . There was scarcely a hint of sunset fire save in a trailing chain of little fleecy golden flocks , which stretched away from the purple of the clouds into the deepening purple of clear sky overhead . [Lance]68-lance , waiting , watched that clear , almost level , outline , until , as clouds do when gazed at fixedly , it took shape for [him]68-lance as the body of [a dead warrior half - covered by a pall]2061-a dead warrior half - covered by a pall . The straight sweep yonder was the shield , still held upon the arm , the peak of shadow below it was the mailed feet . There was the curve of the throat ; the head thrown back ; the feathery plumes of the helmet . The whole world seemed [his]68-lance bier ; the stars , just trembling into sight , the watch - lights round it . " Do [you]105-erda see ? "[68-lance] [he]68-lance asked , as [Erda]105-erda joined [him]68-lance . " From [the great deep]4839-the great deep to [the great deep [he]68-lance goes]4840-the great deep he goes . "[105-erda] [She]105-erda recognized the quotation ; and though [she]105-erda had come out full of determination to deny the glamour of [their]2062-their mutual comprehension , it claimed [her]105-erda in a second . " Yes ! "[105-erda] [she]105-erda answered quickly , and pointing to the trailing drift of cloudlets , added , " bound by gold chains about the feet of [God]96-god . "[105-erda] [He]68-lance turned to look at [her]105-erda then , forgetting fancy in a sudden certainty . " [I]68-lance thought [I]68-lance had something to tell [you]105-erda , "[68-lance] [he]68-lance said , " but [I]68-lance think [you]105-erda know it already , do n't [you]105-erda ? "[68-lance] " Yes ! "[105-erda] [she]105-erda answered , held captive still by that inevitable understanding . " [I]68-lance think [I]68-lance do . "[68-lance] [He]68-lance paused a moment ; then going back to the now fading likeness of that dead " King of the Dead , "[68-lance] continued : " Then that ends it so -- so far as [I]68-lance am concerned . But it remains as an excuse for [my]68-lance asking a question . [Miss Shepherd]105-erda , why are [you]68-lance going to marry [[your]68-lance cousin]4226-your cousin ? "[68-lance] [She]105-erda had known this was coming . " For a great many reasons , "[105-erda] [she]105-erda began boldly ; then paused , wishing for the first time that these reasons had been fewer , feeling that the possession of but one would have made speech easier . " To begin with , it has been the dream of [my]68-lance life . "[68-lance] [He]68-lance turned on [her]105-erda with an amaze which was almost ludicrous . " What ! to marry [him]4226-your cousin ? "[105-erda] [She]105-erda frowned angrily . " No ! To work -- to help -- to give [my]105-erda sympathy -- to stand hand in hand with someone who , as [he]4226-your cousin does , gives [himself]4226-your cousin , as [I]105-erda do , to the great work . To someone whose life will be [mine]105-erda -- whom [I]105-erda can respect and admire and -- and love -- in the best sense of the word-- "[105-erda] [Her]105-erda voice , gaining confidence from its own statements , rose almost passionately . How will the -- the great Work be furthered by [your]105-erda having to look after [the house]719-the house and all that ? And it is n't as if [you]105-erda could n't give the help and sympathy without marrying [a fellow]1393-a fellow . Even the love -- at least [I]68-lance think so . Now , [I]68-lance want to marry [you]105-erda , because-- "[68-lance] " Yes,-- "[105-erda] [she]105-erda said severely , as [he]68-lance paused -- [she]105-erda felt glad to change places with [him]68-lance in the witness box-- " Because , to begin with , it does n't seem possible for [me]68-lance to live [my]68-lance life -- [I]68-lance mean [my]68-lance everyday life , trying to rub along , [you]105-erda know , without doing any harm ; keeping things going as -- as [[my]68-lance people]3462-my people have always kept them , unless [you]105-erda help [me]68-lance . And then-- "[68-lance] [he]68-lance paused again--"from the first moment [I]68-lance saw [you]105-erda , [you]105-erda reminded [me--]68-lance "[68-lance] [he]68-lance paused so long this time that a faint wonder as to what [he]68-lance was going to say next made [her]105-erda heart beat , as [she]105-erda watched [him]68-lance leaning over [the balcony]644-the balcony , looking dreamily at that fading likeness of a dead ' King of [the Dead]243-the dead . ' " [I]68-lance do n't suppose [anyone]3948-anyone had a happier , jollier childhood than [I]68-lance had , "[68-lance] [he]68-lance said suddenly , " though [I]68-lance was [an orphan]4846-an orphan . " [You]105-erda should have seen [[my]68-lance grandfather]4138-my grandfather and [grandmother]760-grandmother , [Miss Shepherd]105-erda . [They]4849-they were like the double Christmas number of an illustrated paper ! [She]760-grandmother used to boast that [she]760-grandmother never saw [a naughty child]4850-a naughty child ; and [she]760-grandmother never did , for [the dear old lady]4851-the dear old lady always walked out of [the room]3952-the room promptly when [we]4853-we tried it on . [I]68-lance remember it used to take the starch out awfully , having [no audience]4854-no audience . But it was the same in everything . It beat even [a boy]523-a boy to be really bad in [that house]4856-that house , somehow . Yes ! [we]4853-we had jolly times ! [You]4857-you would have liked it -- [you]4857-you would like it now"--he[68-lance] turned swiftly and held out both hands--"Come to it!--Come , and be [Lady Carlyon]244-lady carlyon as [she]4851-the dear old lady was ! [People]3436-people may say all that means nothing , but it means everything to [a woman]3949-a woman to be able to count on an inheritance like that for [her--]3949-a woman "[2064-me] [he]2064-me broke off as some of [the others]3977-the others came out into [the balcony]644-the balcony , and bending closer to [her]2067-you , went on in a low voice , " [I]2064-me 've said nothing of [my]2064-me love -- [you]2067-you know all that -- and [I]2064-me think -- Yes-- "[2064-me] [his]2064-me voice took a note of certainty--"I think [you]2067-you -- [you]2067-you like [me]2064-me well enough -- don't [you]2067-you ? "[68-lance] [Lance]68-lance gave an odd little laugh , full of bitterness . " [You]2068-she leave [me]2064-me out in the black night , anyhow , "[2064-me] [he]2064-me said . "[86-laila] [She]86-laila had been finding it dull work waiting for [[her]86-laila guardian]1606-her guardian 's return from [the dining room]4822-the dining room , even though [Vincent]71-vincent had , now and again , found opportunity for a word or look . " Time ! "[71-vincent] echoed [Vincent]71-vincent , coolly . " Of that new song , of course . Come in , [Miss Bonaventura]86-laila , let [us]2079-they decide about it . "[71-vincent] [The girl]481-the girl swept up [her]481-the girl long lashes solemnly . " [I]481-the girl should think a twelve beat would be best , really .
