"[1250-the old priest] And as [he]1250-the old priest spoke , above the hum of [the crowd , silent no longer , rose that insistent throbbing of the old God - maker]2417-the crowd , silent no longer , rose that insistent throbbing of the old god - maker 's drum . [Erda Shepherd]105-erda stood in [[her]105-erda bedroom]2418-her bedroom , under [the wood - shingled house at [Herrnhut]48-herrnhut]2419-the wood - shingled house at herrnhut , looking at a heap of white muslin and delicate embroideries which lay upon [her]105-erda bed . It was the wedding dress . [She]105-erda had just unpacked it ; partly because [she]105-erda felt décœuvré , partly in the hope that the sight of it , ready to be worn so soon , would still the vague disquiet of which [she]105-erda was conscious . Yet if [anyone]3948-anyone had ventured to suggest , when [she]105-erda had said good - by to [Lance Carlyon]68-lance the evening before,--said good - by almost carelessly , by reason of the fervid enthusiasm which absorbed [her,--that]2421-her,--that within twenty - four hours the wisdom of the farewell should seem logically doubtful , [she]105-erda would have been desperately angry . But [she]105-erda was too honest to deny that the doubt had come . Come in a moment , wildly , passionately , when [they]2422-they had thwarted [her]105-erda desire of joining in the crusade over [the other side of [the river]333-the river]2423-the other side of the river along [[the pilgrims]3444-the pilgrims ' road]1648-the pilgrims ' road . [She]105-erda had meant to go with [David]190-david , who was to take up [his]190-david position at [a camping - ground some six miles off]2427-a camping - ground some six miles off , and [she]105-erda had fought hard for the privilege . But [they]2422-they had quoted Scripture at [her]105-erda to prove that [a wife]824-a wife , or [a wife to be]2429-a wife to be , must needs hamper [a man]533-a man more than [any other woman]2431-any other woman , even [[his]190-david sister]3723-his sister . [David]190-david had been kind about it , almost too kind . [She]105-erda flushed a little at the recollection of [his]190-david words , [his]190-david look ; for that sort of thing had scarcely come into [her]105-erda calculations . But [Dr. Campbell]154-dr. campbell had pompously reminded [her]105-erda that [her]105-erda future profession would be [wife]3702-wife , [caretaker]2434-caretaker , [sympathizer]2435-sympathizer , and [general bolsterer]2436-general bolsterer -- up to [a worker]2437-a worker . Nor need [she]105-erda think the task small ; it was the noblest one [a woman]3949-a woman could have . [He]190-david had gone on to comfort [her]105-erda with instances of such general support from [his]190-david own life and those of [[his]190-david friends]2439-his friends , until , with a flash , that unexpected questioning had come to [the girl]481-the girl 's mind . [She]105-erda had asked [herself]105-erda what difference there was in the nobility of being [[one man]414-one man 's wife]2442-one man 's wife or [another's]2443-another's -- provided [the man]3467-the man was worthy and [his]3467-the man work in [the world]404-the world good ? [Father Ninian]247-father ninian 's words , " [I]247-father ninian can wish no better wish for [you]481-the girl and for [the world]404-the world , "[247-father ninian] had come back to [her]105-erda then , as if in answer to [her]105-erda questioning . And , even now , they echoed in [her]105-erda heart . [The house]719-the house was very quiet , very shadowy , for the sun left [the little oasis of valley]2447-the little oasis of valley set in [its]2447-the little oasis of valley [circling wilderness of hill]2448-circling wilderness of hill , long before a fraction of light faded from the sky above [it]2447-the little oasis of valley . [She]105-erda could hear [Mrs. Campbell]152-mrs. campbell 's voice down [the little ladder - like stairs]2449-the little ladder - like stairs , conferring with [the cook]4560-the cook over the wedding cake , and , in a side - issue , exhorting [him]4560-the cook to be sure and have the soup hot in case [the workers]2451-the workers might return exhausted , and require something to eat the moment [they]2451-the workers arrived . [Erda]105-erda sat down on the bed beside the white muslin , and fingered the quaint little cap idly , as [she]105-erda told [herself]105-erda that such things would be a part of [her]105-erda duties in the future . But only a part . Life was no unknown country to [this girl , who had spent years in [a medical mission]2453-a medical mission]2452-this girl , who had spent years in a medical mission . [She]2452-this girl , who had spent years in a medical mission was [no ignorant baby]2454-no ignorant baby , standing , in a fashion happily past , on the verge of [she]2452-this girl , who had spent years in a medical mission knew not what . [She]105-erda looked ahead calmly , taking [the world]404-the world as [the Creator]1359-the creator made it . [She]105-erda thought , without a flush , as [good women]2457-good women do , of [the children [she]105-erda hoped might come]2458-the children she hoped might come ; and as [she]105-erda thought , [she]105-erda frowned , not from any revolt of [her]105-erda spiritual or physical nature , but because , once more , the question arose : " Was not [Lance]68-lance right ? Was not this the essence ? Was it not everything to be sure of the inheritance ? "[105-erda] [She]105-erda started up at the sound of [[her]105-erda aunt]2103-her aunt calling [her]105-erda , glad of the interruption . Had [she]105-erda not better , [the good lady]3953-the good lady suggested , try on the dress , now [she]105-erda was about it , since if there was anything amiss , the sooner [the tailor]2461-the tailor set to work to rectify it the better . Undoubtedly . Besides , [she]105-erda told [herself]105-erda , the mere putting on of this , the sign of [her]105-erda new profession , would be healthful . It would give [her]105-erda the feeling of being set apart for the life which [she]105-erda had chosen deliberately , chosen with [her]105-erda eyes open , though , maybe , focussed too much on that mental companionship . Too much ? [Impossible]257-impossible ! [Lance]68-lance was wrong . That was the crowning glory of marriage ; and even if it seemed hard to have to stand aside from actually fighting the good fight , the victory would be [hers]105-erda -- [hers]105-erda almost more than [[her]105-erda husband]3787-her husband 's , since the effort would be greater , the work more against the grain . Yes , [she]105-erda would try on the dress ; and if it did not fit perfectly , what matter ? Was anything in [the world]404-the world perfect ? Yet it should be as perfect as [she]105-erda could compass ; even the little cap should not lack its bunch of orange blossoms ! As [she]105-erda told [herself]105-erda this [she]105-erda was for the time womanhood incarnate ; womanhood playing , with dainty little tendernesses and conceits , about the abyss for which it is responsible . So , with the smile of [an angel]2464-an angel , [she]105-erda passed into [the garden]433-the garden , the old militant feeling at [her]105-erda heart . [Her]105-erda feet were on the golden stairs . [She]105-erda was going to regain the lost Paradise hand in hand with [one of those whom [she]105-erda had driven from it]2466-one of those whom she had driven from it . [They]2467-they were going to forget all the consequences of that mistake . [They]2467-they were going to be -- what ? ... The vague confusion did not prevent [her]105-erda feeling that [she]105-erda was absolutely certain [she]105-erda was on the right path . Indeed , the only regret of which [she]105-erda was conscious was one that [she]105-erda was not on the other side of [the river]333-the river , on [[the pilgrims]3444-the pilgrims ' road]1648-the pilgrims ' road , with [the rest of [the mission]2112-the mission]2471-the rest of the mission . [She]105-erda stood looking over to the frowning cliffs from the little wooden landing - stage , built out at the bottom of [the garden]433-the garden into [the wide shallows of [the river]333-the river]2474-the wide shallows of the river , which here showed scarcely a streak or dimple of current . [She]105-erda could see [the mission boat lying moored on the other side , against [the fighters]2477-the fighters ' return]2476-the mission boat lying moored on the other side , against the fighters ' return . Yet the very idea of fight seemed impossible , [she]105-erda thought , in that utter peacefulness and stillness . [The rim of dark hills]2478-the rim of dark hills circled the jewel of the sun - bright sky tenderly , as if it sought to keep in the heavy , sweet perfume of the orange blossoms which starred every tree in [the wide , fruitful garden]2479-the wide , fruitful garden . They were famous oranges , those in [the Herrnhut garden]2480-the herrnhut garden ; grafts brought by [a missionary from [Malta]54-malta]2481-a missionary from malta . [Mrs. Campbell]152-mrs. campbell , [notable woman]2482-notable woman as [she]152-mrs. campbell was , made a steady income for good works out of the sale of the great red - skinned , red - hearted fruit , and prided [herself]152-mrs. campbell in keeping them later on [[her]152-mrs. campbell trees]2483-her trees than [anyone in [India]8-india]2484-anyone in india . Indeed , in [the shadier , colder alleys]2485-the shadier , colder alleys some were still hanging side by side with the new blossoms . A sort of example to [these novices]2486-these novices , showing [them]2486-these novices what [their]2486-these novices real work in [the world]404-the world ought to be ! [Erda]105-erda , smiling at [her]105-erda own conceit , stroked one of the warm yet stainless petals in the bunch [she]105-erda held as if it were a sentient thing . Perhaps it was . Who knows ! As [she]105-erda turned to go back , warned by a softening of the sky that the time was later than [she]105-erda thought , something showed rounding [the smooth , silver bend of [the river above]2489-the river above]2488-the smooth , silver bend of the river above ; and [she]105-erda paused , shading [her]105-erda eyes with [her]105-erda hand , to see what it was . [A raft]4939-a raft . The first of the rafts of wood which at certain seasons were floated down [the river]333-the river to [Eshwara]1-eshwara . [[Am - ma]131-am - ma 's raft]2492-am - ma 's raft , most likely , which [he]131-am - ma had told [her]105-erda [he]131-am - ma had to pilot . Yes ! There [he]131-am - ma was on the quaint contrivance which [the river folk]2493-the river folk used for journeys down [stream]954-stream . A common string bed , no more , no less , supported between inflated bladders of skin . The sight of it gave [her]105-erda a pang to think that [she]105-erda would never more go bobbing , sidling , dipping , racing on one of [them]2495-them , as [the mission folk]2496-the mission folk always did when [they]2496-the mission folk wanted to stay the last possible minute of holiday at [Herrnhut]48-herrnhut , and get back to [Eshwara]1-eshwara as quickly as [they]2496-the mission folk could . For it took half the time of [the winding road]2497-the winding road , when [the river]333-the river , as now , was quiet and manageable . And [Am - ma]131-am - ma was [the most dexterous manager of the singular craft]2499-the most dexterous manager of the singular craft . There [he]131-am - ma was , paddling for dear life ; now leaping to [his]131-am - ma great pile of timber , steering [it]2500-it with [his]131-am - ma paddle round a bend , then back to [his]131-am - ma string bed with the tow rope , to haul the rudderless mass to a straight line again . If [she]105-erda had time , [she]105-erda thought , [she]105-erda would have asked [him]131-am - ma to take [her]105-erda , just once more , as far as [the ferry]2501-the ferry , two miles below . Then [she]105-erda might have walked back through [the fields]2502-the fields . [She]105-erda had often taken the pleasant little trip with [Am - ma]131-am - ma . There was no danger so far ; but after that , when [the river]333-the river began to slip and slide , even [he]131-am - ma had sometimes to cut [a raft]4939-a raft adrift and trust to catching it again in smoother water ; since it was not pleasant to have [such a crushing neighbour in the eddies and swirls of a lasher]2505-such a crushing neighbour in the eddies and swirls of a lasher . As [she]105-erda stood watching [him]131-am - ma , [she]105-erda saw [him]131-am - ma pause , looking towards [her]105-erda , then leap from [the raft]4626-the raft and come paddling down [stream]954-stream . [He]131-am - ma had evidently seen [her]105-erda waiting on the landing - stage , and thought [she]105-erda wanted [him]131-am - ma ; so [she]105-erda shook [her]105-erda head and began to walk back to [the house]719-the house . As [she]105-erda did so an orange caught [her]105-erda eye under a tree , whence it had fallen from sheer red - gold ripeness , and , knowing how [Mrs. Campbell]152-mrs. campbell mourned a single loss , [she]105-erda gathered it up and took it with [her]105-erda . Back in [[her]105-erda own room]2509-her own room , [she]105-erda began to pin [her]105-erda bunch of blossoms in [her]105-erda cap hurriedly , for [she]105-erda had lingered longer in [the garden]433-the garden than [she]105-erda had intended , and there was a chance , only a chance , that those much to be envied [Church]223-the church militant - militants might return and claim [her]105-erda attention . Still , hurried as [she]105-erda was , [she]105-erda knelt down beside the bed for a moment or two , and , with [her]105-erda clasped hands laid almost caressingly among the soft muslin , prayed that [she]105-erda might wear this symbol of [her]105-erda entry into a new profession worthily . So , scarcely looking at [herself]105-erda in the glass which , indeed , was too small to show [her]105-erda more than a rather pale face smiling under a quaint little cap , [she]105-erda dressed hastily . [[Her]105-erda aunt]2103-her aunt would be able to tell [her]105-erda if there was anything wrong in [the lighter rooms below]2512-the lighter rooms below ; [here]3395-here , under the roof , it was already a little dark . Then catching up the orange , [she]105-erda ran [downstairs]1266-downstairs , wondering if the bridal blossoms always smelt so overpoweringly strong , and thinking that , if it was so , they must make the trying ceremony still more trying to [one who disliked to have strong scents about them]2515-one who disliked to have strong scents about them , as [she]105-erda did . [[Her]105-erda aunt]2103-her aunt was not to be seen in [the dining room]4822-the dining room , so [Erda]105-erda parted the heavy curtains which , in Indian fashion , divided it from [the drawing - room]3545-the drawing - room , and looked in to see if [she]2103-her aunt were there . It was at all times [a dark room]2519-a dark room , especially in late afternoon , as now ; but the light from behind [her]105-erda sent a shaft straight to the pier glass which stood -- the joy of [Mrs. Campbell]152-mrs. campbell 's heart -- just opposite the curtains ; so making -- as [the good lady]3953-the good lady used fondly to say -- [the room]3952-the room look much larger than [it]3952-the room really was to those entering [it]3952-the room . But what [the girl]481-the girl saw in it to - day was no illusory enlargement of actualities , no idealization of fact . It was something real , something not to be explained away , exaggerated , or minimized . It was [a woman , tall , slender , robed in white]2523-a woman , tall , slender , robed in white ; [a woman with red - gold hair , edged by the light behind]2524-a woman with red - gold hair , edged by the light behind [her]2523-a woman , tall , slender , robed in white ; a woman with a red - gold apple in [her]2523-a woman , tall , slender , robed in white hand . [She]481-the girl stood arrested before [herself]481-the girl ; helpless before the memory of a voice-- " All straight folds -- the sunshine on [your]481-the girl hair , and a red - gold apple in [your]481-the girl hand -- [the World]404-the world 's Desire ! "[481-the girl] And [she]481-the girl had refused [him]2525-his [his]2525-his . [She]481-the girl stood for a second , not thinking at all ; simply , with a rush , feeling the truth , feeling [herself]481-the girl . Then with a queer little cry which might have been [his]2525-his name had it been articulate , [she]481-the girl broke adrift . Broke , for the time , from all moorings , and possessed with but the one idea that [she]481-the girl could not do one thing , that [she]481-the girl must do another , [she]481-the girl turned to [the garden]433-the garden , and,--the red - gold fruit still in [her]481-the girl hand,--hurried breathlessly through the waning light , through the dead - sweet perfume of the blossoms , till [she]481-the girl found [herself]481-the girl , [she]481-the girl knew not why -- save that [she]481-the girl must have air , have space -- upon the edge of [the river]333-the river . There was something now swaying idly against the landing - stage ; a rude craft buoyed up by air ! And there was [a rude sort of man in it,--comprehending , yet uncomprehending,--primitive , simple , expectant]2528-a rude sort of man in it,--comprehending , yet uncomprehending,--primitive , simple , expectant . " [Huzoor]90-huzoor ! "[2525-his] [he]2525-his said , with broad smiles and outstretched hand . " [I]2525-his have been waiting the Huzoor 's pleasure . The Presence will go whither ? "[2525-his] [Whither]258-whither ? Even in [her]481-the girl excitement the quaint coincidence struck [her]481-the girl as absurd , and yet it seemed to sweep [her]481-the girl further still from [her]481-the girl moorings . [Whither]258-whither ? [She]481-the girl gave that queer little cry again , and this time it was " [Lance]68-lance ! [Lance]68-lance ! "[481-the girl] " [Whither]258-whither did [the Miss - sahiba]4965-the miss - sahiba say ? "[131-am - ma] asked [Am - ma]131-am - ma gravely . The cry turned to a strange laugh . " To [Eshwara]1-eshwara -- where else does [the river]333-the river go -- where else ? "[481-the girl] [The strange , frail boat]2529-the strange , frail boat was sidling against [the landing - stage]2530-the landing - stage in the pulse of [the river]333-the river ; [her]481-the girl stranger , frailer self was adrift on [the greater river of life]2532-the greater river of life . And a hand , heedless , seeing nothing strange in either , careless of all the fine - drawn niceties of culture , had hold of [hers]481-the girl . " So , straight to the centre , [Huzoor]90-huzoor ! [I]481-the girl have placed the seat correctly . That is right ! [The Miss - sahiba]4385-the miss - sahiba recollects the old rules ; [we]4968-we shall be in [Eshwara]1-eshwara before dawn ! "[481-the girl] [She]481-the girl sat down mechanically , feeling only that [she]481-the girl was adrift -- adrift on [the river that went to [Eshwara]1-eshwara]2533-the river that went to eshwara -- where else -- and that [she]481-the girl was glad ; glad because [she]481-the girl could not stay , because [she]481-the girl could not face-- And then the thought came of facing something else -- [his]2534-his glad delight when [she]481-the girl came floating down [the river]333-the river -- not dead , like [the Lily Maid]259-the lily maid to [Lancelot]68-lance -- but alive -- [a woman with a red - gold apple in [her]2536-a woman with a red - gold apple in her]2536-a woman with a red - gold apple in her hand-- [She]481-the girl sat staring at what [she]481-the girl held , as if hypnotized by its colour , absolutely unconscious of anything else till [Am - ma]131-am - ma 's voice came stolidly . " [We]4969-we must pick up [the raft]4626-the raft first , [Huzoor]90-huzoor . [This slave]4971-this slave let [it]4626-the raft drift while [he]4971-this slave waited for [the Miss]4972-the miss ; but [we]4969-we shall find it at [the ferry]2501-the ferry . "[131-am - ma] At [the ferry]2501-the ferry ! The familiar idea startled [her]481-the girl from dreams to the reality . How came [she]481-the girl [there]3509-there ? What had [she]481-the girl done ? What did this mean ? A flush of intolerable shame swept to [her]481-the girl face ; [she]481-the girl rose to escape . But [Am - ma]131-am - ma 's warning hand was on [hers]481-the girl in an instant ; that hand , so heedless of so many limitations , so certain here that there was no escape from these limitations . " [The Miss - sahiba]4385-the miss - sahiba forgets , "[131-am - ma] [he]131-am - ma said deferentially . " When [one]3501-one is in [the stream]831-the stream there is no change possible ; but if [the place]3423-the place is not right [we]4978-we can alter it at [the ferry]2501-the ferry . "[131-am - ma] [She]481-the girl sat down again , telling [herself]481-the girl this was true . [She]481-the girl could alter it at [the ferry]2501-the ferry . [She]481-the girl could walk [home]3521-home through [the fields]2502-the fields . [No one]3741-no one need know ( the quaint craft , rocking itself back to balance , made [her]481-the girl feel giddy ) , [her]481-the girl dress was only muslin , [she]481-the girl could remove the cap ; if necessary , borrow a shawl from [the bible - woman near [the ferry]2501-the ferry]2543-the bible - woman near the ferry , saying [she]2543-the bible - woman near the ferry had not thought it would be so chilly . [She]481-the girl buried [her]481-the girl face in both [her]481-the girl hands in a sort of despairing revolt at the duplicity , so , with the red - gold fruit in [her]481-the girl lap , sat trying to think . But [she]481-the girl could not . The scent of the orange blossoms seemed to cloud [her]481-the girl senses . So [she]481-the girl raised [her]481-the girl face again , and stared at [the river]333-the river . Why had [she]481-the girl done this ? Why had [she]481-the girl put this thing , that [she]481-the girl must always conceal , into [her]481-the girl life ? There would always , now , be something [she]481-the girl could not say straight out ; and yet if [she]481-the girl lived to be a hundred the memory of it would never fade ; it would be as fresh as it was now when [she]481-the girl died , with [David]190-david 's hand in [hers]481-the girl ! The intolerable humiliation of it stung deep ; the instinct to escape rose fiercely . " Be quick ! "[481-the girl] [she]481-the girl cried , seeing [Am - ma]131-am - ma idle , letting the current do the work . " [I]481-the girl want to get there as soon as possible . [I]481-the girl must , or something worse may happen . There is n't a moment to spare ! "[481-the girl] [Am - ma]3733-am - ma bent towards [her]481-the girl from [his]3733-am - ma seat astride a skin air - bag . " Did [they]4980-they kill [anyone]3948-anyone ? "[3733-am - ma] [he]3733-am - ma asked , in sudden interest . " Did [the prisoners]1510-the prisoners escape as it was arranged ? And was it [Carlone]260-carlone - sahib - sahib [they]4980-they [killed?--they]261-killed?--they swore it should be [he]260-carlone - sahib , because [he]260-carlone - sahib laughed at the miracle . "[3733-am - ma] " [The prisoners]1510-the prisoners -- [Carlone - sahib]260-carlone - sahib -- killed ! "[481-the girl] [she]481-the girl echoed stupidly . Then with a great throb of the heart [she]481-the girl realized that here might be something of more importance than [her]481-the girl self - humiliation . Had [Father Ninian]247-father ninian been right ? Had there really been some conspiracy afoot , and had [Am - ma]131-am - ma heard ? " [I]481-the girl have had no news from [Eshwara]1-eshwara , [Am - ma]131-am - ma , "[481-the girl] [she]481-the girl said boldly , " what is this about [prisoners]989-prisoners escaping , and [the sahib - logue]4701-the sahib - logue being killed ? Who was going to do that ? "[481-the girl] [Am - ma]131-am - ma looked crestfallen . " [I]481-the girl thought [the Huzoor]4533-the huzoor had heard -- that that was why [she]4533-the huzoor was going . It is nothing . Idle talk . It is always talk . And [the Huzoors]118-the huzoors have [the Dee - puk - râg]878-the dee - puk - râg . [They]118-the huzoors must still be [kings]1384-kings . "[481-the girl] " [Am - ma]3733-am - ma , "[481-the girl] [she]481-the girl interrupted sternly , " [you]3733-am - ma must tell [me]481-the girl about this . If [you]3733-am - ma do not , [I]481-the girl will take [my]481-the girl hand off [[your]3733-am - ma son]4802-your son 's head -- [I]481-the girl will never-- "[481-the girl] [He]131-am - ma almost dropped [his]131-am - ma paddle in absolute terror . " [Huzoor]90-huzoor "[131-am - ma] [he]131-am - ma said helplessly , " it is talk , idle talk . It is always so . All day long , and all night long in [the bazaars]1796-the bazaars , and [the Masters]4924-the masters have the Dee - puk - râg . There is no fear ; but [this slave]4971-this slave will tell . "[131-am - ma] [They]2547-they were almost opposite [the ferry]2501-the ferry before [he]131-am - ma had finished [his]131-am - ma tale , and [she]481-the girl had grasped the whole tissue of trivialities which yet went to make up so formidable a possibility . The discontent and dread regarding [the canal]3421-the canal , the strange lights , the deaths in [gaol]902-gaol , the return of the cursed corpse , [Gopi]165-gopi -- the ticket - of - leave man's -- talk of revenge if the cleansing water should fail . Much of this was new to [her]481-the girl , but it hung together with what [she]481-the girl already knew ; and yet it seemed incredible ! What could be the object ? What could [they]2547-they expect to do ? [Here Am - ma]2551-here am - ma had smiled inscrutably , and said [the Miss]694-the miss did not know bazaar talk . Everything was possible to it . Had [they]2547-they not even spoken of making [a new Nawab out of [Roshan Khân]89-roshan]2553-a new nawab out of roshan khân , [the risaldar]3899-the risaldar ? indeed , had not [the jemedar at [the palace]3477-the palace]2555-the jemedar at the palace already treated [him]131-am - ma as one ? And the Pool of Immortality ? Had it risen or not ? [Am - ma]131-am - ma could not say . [They]2547-they had asked [him]131-am - ma with bribes and threats to do the job -- that was only [the priest]3909-the priest 's revenge , but it would serve other purposes too -- but [he]131-am - ma had refused , partly because [he]131-am - ma had to come away , and partly because [he]131-am - ma was [the servant of [the Light - bringers]1428-the light - bringers]2558-the servant of the light - bringers . As to when [the prisoners]1510-the prisoners were to escape [he]131-am - ma could not say . To - day , perhaps to - morrow , most likely never ; unless something really happened . It was talk . [The Miss]2561-the miss need have no fear . [The Huzoors]118-the huzoors , having the Dee - puk - râg , must needs be safe , and [Carlone - sahib]260-carlone - sahib was [a real hero]2562-a real hero ; none braver , none stronger . That decided [her]2561-the miss . [She]2561-the miss had been counting costs as [she]2561-the miss listened . An hour , say , back to [Herrnhut]48-herrnhut . Even if [anyone]3948-anyone were [there]3509-there , which was uncertain , half an hour at least to start [a messenger]2565-a messenger . Then [the boat]643-the boat might be at [the other side of [the river]333-the river]2423-the other side of the river . Then all those miles , on [a rough road]2569-a rough road at night ! " When shall [we]4994-we get to [Eshwara]1-eshwara ? "[2561-the miss] [she]2561-the miss asked . " At the turn of the night and day if [the river]333-the river is kind , "[131-am - ma] said [Am - ma]131-am - ma , but [he]131-am - ma looked doubtfully into a copper tint that remained in the sky , though the sun must have set behind [the mountains]2570-the mountains . It had a curious effect , that copper - coloured dome above [the rim of almost black hills]2571-the rim of almost black hills , with [the river]333-the river , dark , mysterious , already beginning to slide towards [the narrowing ravine]2573-the narrowing ravine . It did not strike [her]2561-the miss that [she]2561-the miss [herself]2561-the miss , adrift on [that river]2574-that river in what was to be [her]2561-the miss wedding dress , with prehistoric , [aboriginal Am - ma]131-am - ma as pilot to [her]2561-the miss and [a lumber raft]2575-a lumber raft , would have had a still more curious effect to [a spectator]2576-a spectator 's eyes . But there were none , and it was already almost dark . " Am - ma , "[2561-the miss] [she]2561-the miss said , " [I]2561-the miss will give [you]131-am - ma fifty rupees , and keep [my]2561-the miss hand on [the son]712-the son 's head , if [you]131-am - ma will leave [the raft]4626-the raft here , and take [me]2561-the miss as quick as [you]131-am - ma can to [Eshwara]1-eshwara -- to [the little steps below [the fort]3493-the fort]4998-the little steps below the fort -- fifty whole rupees ! "[2561-the miss] [He]131-am - ma shook [his]131-am - ma head and grinned , partly at [his]131-am - ma own superlative honesty . " [We]5000-we should not go so fast , [Huzoor]90-huzoor , now the slide is near , "[131-am - ma] [he]131-am - ma said ; " for , see [you]90-huzoor , [the raft]4626-the raft is [the wood - sahib]5002-the wood - sahib 's new shape . It is a good shape ; it came down [the rapids]5003-the rapids above [the valley]5004-the valley like [a boat]4374-a boat , faster than this , when the paddle can not be used . It will take [us]5000-we with it . [I]131-am - ma will fasten this behind , and steer . [The Huzoors]118-the huzoors are [Light - bringers]1385-light - bringers . "[131-am - ma] [He]131-am - ma had already paddled alongside the raft,--a boat - shaped mass of huge logs rising towards the back -- and , leaping to it , came back , after a moment , with the tow - rope . " It shall do the work , "[131-am - ma] [he]131-am - ma said , with another grin , as [he]131-am - ma fastened the air - buoyed bed to a ring placed for the purpose in one of the logs . " [Lo]123-lo ! who would grudge [men]312-men 's brains to [the Masters]4924-the masters when [they]312-men are clever as [the Gods]3472-the gods [themselves]312-men ? [The Miss]5011-the miss will see how fast this goes . [We]2578-we shall be at [Eshwara]1-eshwara before the night turns to day . "[131-am - ma] Something in [his]131-am - ma tone warned [her]2577-she that the recurrence of the phrase was not pure chance . " That is when [the prisoners]1510-the prisoners were to escape ? "[2577-she] [she]2577-she said quickly . [He]131-am - ma did not affirm or deny it . " So many things happen in the fight of Dawn , "[131-am - ma] [he]131-am - ma said affably . That was all ; but [she]2577-she thought rapidly . The rising , or whatever the conspiracy aimed at , could scarcely have happened just after [they]2578-we left [Eshwara]1-eshwara the night before . In that case the news must have followed [them]2578-we on [the road]3494-the road . Therefore , if it was to happen at all , if this were not all talk -- and [Father Ninian]247-father ninian 's words came to make [her]2577-she doubt its being so -- it would happen in a few hours . So [she]2577-she must be there in time to give warning . As [she]2577-she thought this , a sudden strain at the tow - rope , a quick dip of the boat - shaped prow of [the raft]4626-the raft , a louder swish of the water as it curved out from its rising stern , told [her]2577-she [she]2577-she was adrift , indeed , on the way to [Eshwara]1-eshwara ! It seemed almost more incredible than what had gone before . But there was nothing to be ashamed of here . It was the only possible thing to do under the circumstances . [Her]2577-she journey might prove unnecessary , but it might not ; and supposing anything should really happen -- to -- to [anybody]1392-anybody -- [she]2577-she would never be able to forgive [herself]2577-she if , knowing this chance of danger , [she]2577-she had not done [her]2577-she best to avert it . The copper - coloured glow , into which weather - wise [Am - ma]3733-am - ma had looked , distrustfully , as it domed [the little valley]2583-the little valley set in [its]2583-the little valley [rim of hills]2584-rim of hills , had replaced that of sunset in [Eshwara]1-eshwara also , and [Pidar Narâyan]84-pidar narâyan 's eyes , weather - wise as [the fisherman]2585-the fisherman 's , looked at it as doubtfully , as [he]84-pidar narâyan walked [home]3521-home with [Lance]68-lance and [Vincent Dering]71-vincent when the long strain at [the Pool of Immortality]4072-the pool of immortality was over . " If it were not so early in the year , [I]84-pidar narâyan should predict a dust - storm -- a real electrical dust - storm , "[84-pidar narâyan] [he]84-pidar narâyan said . [Lance]68-lance , whose hands were full of cut - paper Gods -- for in obedience to a sudden impulse , [he]68-lance had stopped on [his]68-lance way through [the crowd]4412-the crowd to buy up [the old Brahmin]2302-the old brahmin 's whole stock in trade , and give [him]68-lance an extra eight annas to go away and not drum any more -- looked up also , and filled [his]68-lance broad chest with a great breath . " Perhaps that is it . [I]68-lance 've felt choking all day -- horrid ! "[68-lance] [Vincent Dering]71-vincent laughed . " [I]71-vincent do n't choke -- [I]71-vincent tingle ; and it is rather jolly . Yes , [sir]3491-sir ; there is a lot of electricity in the air , and [I]71-vincent should n't wonder if [we]5014-we had a regular black snorter . Glad it did n't come in the middle of the miracle ' biz ' , for , as [a general smasher - up of ordinary experiences]5015-a general smasher - up of ordinary experiences , commend [me]71-vincent to a real electrical dust - storm ! It seems to attract [the earth]827-the earth , earthy , in everything . In fact , if there is such a thing as [the Devil]4118-the devil , and [he]4118-the devil ever gets the upper hand , it is then-- "[71-vincent] [Father Ninian]247-father ninian turned to [him]68-lance quickly , and then to the crowd,-through which [they]4412-the crowd were still cleaving that curiously acquiescent way which white faces still cleave through dark ones--"Then [I]247-father ninian trust , [[my]247-father ninian son]4595-my son , "[247-father ninian] [he]247-father ninian said gently , " that for [your]4595-my son sake and [theirs]4412-the crowd the storm may not come . "[247-father ninian] [He]247-father ninian indicated [the crowd]4412-the crowd . " If there was going to be a row it would have come off before this ; now [they]4412-the crowd will settle down , [you]5026-you 'll see , and go on to [the next camping - ground]5027-the next camping - ground to - morrow morning as if nothing had gone wrong . [They]4412-the crowd are such creatures of habit ; [you]5026-you could see that from [their]4412-the crowd sticking on in expectation of that footling old miracle all day ! "[247-father ninian] [Father Ninian]247-father ninian , in that curiously irrelevant way [he]247-father ninian had , put on the gold pince - nez which always dangled over [his]247-father ninian black soutane , and looked round [him]247-father ninian again . " [They]4412-the crowd will settle down , "[247-father ninian] [he]247-father ninian said quietly , " if nothing new crops up to give [them]4412-the crowd a lead into new ways . "[247-father ninian] [They]2595-they had reached [the courtyard which lay between [the palace]3477-the palace and [the Fort]3493-the fort]2596-the courtyard which lay between the palace and the fort , and with a wave of [his]247-father ninian hand in farewell , [he]247-father ninian passed along the wall to the former , while [the others]3977-the others , striking across [the raised union - jack of paths]2600-the raised union - jack of paths , made for the latter . [The yard]2601-the yard was crammed with [pilgrims]1948-pilgrims on [their]1948-pilgrims way to bathe on the river steps . " Who [the deuce]1308-the deuce are [those fellows]5029-those fellows ? "[71-vincent] said [Vincent]71-vincent , angrily , as [half a dozen figures]2603-half a dozen figures slipped out through the door in [the bastion]2604-the bastion , as [they]2595-they approached , and mixing with [the crowd]4412-the crowd , got lost in it , while the door was closed behind [them]2595-they by some unseen hand . " [I]2606-he 'll talk to [Roshan]89-roshan about that . [He]89-roshan was complaining only this morning that [the men]2022-the men were breaking out of [barracks]5031-barracks . What else can [he]89-roshan expect if [he]89-roshan does n't look out . By [Jove]76-jove ! [I]2606-he 'll teach ['em]89-roshan ! "[2606-he] [His]2606-he first words , indeed , as [he]2606-he entered [the outer courtyard of [the Fort]3493-the fort]2607-the outer courtyard of the fort , was to order [a sentry]2609-a sentry down to close the doors against [all comers]2610-all comers without a written pass from [him]2606-he , and as [he]2606-he went by [the guard - house]2611-the guard - house [he]2606-he gave rather a sharp reprimand to [Roshan Khân]89-roshan , who happened to be outside , for not having kept [his]89-roshan eyes open while in charge of [the Fort]3493-the fort during [his]89-roshan absence . [No one]3741-no one was in future to use the small door ; the key was to be brought to [him]89-roshan , and all passes were to be stopped for that night . " [Roshan]89-roshan looks in a demon bad temper . [I]68-lance wonder what 's up ? "[68-lance] remarked [Lance]68-lance , casually , as [he]68-lance passed on through a wicket in the massive closed gates to [the inner courtyard]2614-the inner courtyard , where [[the officers]2615-the officers ' quarters]2616-the officers ' quarters lay , hugging [the river wall]2617-the river wall . [It]2618-it was quite [a citadel]2619-a citadel , [a distinct fortification of [itself]2618-it , with no entrance or exit except through [the outer yard]2621-the outer yard]2620-a distinct fortification of itself , with no entrance or exit except through the outer yard , or by the little flight of steps leading down to [the river]333-the river , at the foot of which [Lance]68-lance moored [[his]68-lance canoe]2623-his canoe . " [He]89-roshan has been sulky as a bear with [me]71-vincent these last few days , "[71-vincent] replied [Captain Dering]71-vincent , with a contemptuous smile . " [I]71-vincent believe [the old Colonel]5032-the old colonel was right after all , and coming [here]3395-here has put wind in [his]89-roshan head . [I]71-vincent shall have to teach [Mr. Roshan]264-mr. roshan that , [good man]5034-good man as [he]89-roshan is , [he]89-roshan is only [a risaldar]4260-a risaldar , before long . "[71-vincent] " [Poor devil]5036-poor devil , "[68-lance] said [Lance]68-lance under [his]68-lance breath . " [I]68-lance 'm always a bit sorry for [Roshan]89-roshan . [He]89-roshan would be [a fine fellow]5037-a fine fellow -- if -- if [he]89-roshan was n't so -- so civilized . "[68-lance] " Civilized , "[71-vincent] echoed [Vincent]71-vincent , with a laugh . " [You]68-lance have n't seen [him]89-roshan fight . [I]68-lance have . [Talk of devils]5038-talk of devils ; [he]89-roshan has got one in [him]89-roshan , if [you]68-lance like ! "[68-lance] [He]68-lance certainly had at that moment , when , having gone straight to [[his]68-lance quarters]2624-his quarters after [Vincent]71-vincent 's reprimand , [he]68-lance found [himself]68-lance alone , and free to show [his]68-lance feelings . And yet , had [he]68-lance been calm , [he]68-lance could scarcely have told wherein the grievance lay which for the moment clamoured for -- no -- not redress -- revenge . It was not the first time that [he]68-lance had had to ignore hints , innuendoes , suggestions of Heaven knows what impossible intrigues , as [he]68-lance had had that very afternoon . It was not the first time that , in [his]68-lance position as intermediary between the ignorance of [the native soldier]2625-the native soldier and the ignorance of [the English officer]2626-the english officer , [he]68-lance had had to ' ca ' canny , ' so as not to alienate the confidence of either . Indeed , the consciousness of the necessity for this , by enhancing the value of [his]68-lance services , had always been a pride to [him]68-lance hitherto . And these particular intrigues were so childish ; especially if -- [he]68-lance paused in [his]68-lance angry pacing of [the room]3952-the room , and smiled complacently . Why should [he]68-lance give a thought to an impossible plan , when a possible one lay ready to [his]68-lance hand ? If [he]68-lance married [Laila]86-laila , [the land]750-the land , almost the title , would be [his]68-lance of right . It would be easy anyhow to regain . Then with a fresh frown , [he]68-lance remembered [Vincent]71-vincent 's order . That would upset [his]68-lance plans . [He]68-lance had meant to slip out by the bastion gate just before -- say an hour before -- dawn , and cross over to [the palace]3477-the palace . [Akbar Khân]110-akbar had arranged to be there to let [him]68-lance into [the garden]433-the garden . Now [he]68-lance must make other arrangements . [He]68-lance must find [the old eunuch]2631-the old eunuch , change the hour and [the place]3423-the place ; since nothing -- no ! not all the tyranny in [the world]404-the world -- should prevent [his]68-lance carrying out [his]68-lance intention of seeing [[his]68-lance cousin]3859-his cousin , and claiming [her]3859-his cousin as [his]68-lance -- [his]68-lance by right . So [he]68-lance must settle this at once ; settle it before there was any chance , [he]68-lance told [himself]68-lance bitterly , of [[his]68-lance superior officer]2635-his superior officer coming out of [the mess]2636-the mess -- where no doubt [he]2635-his superior officer was guzzling swine 's flesh and bibbing wine--(that faint amaze at the presence in [his]68-lance own mind of such antiquated half - forgotten ideas assailed [him]68-lance again at this point ) to encroach further on [his]68-lance liberty , [his]68-lance privileges . [He]68-lance had to pass [the troopers]2375-the troopers ' lines on [his]68-lance way to the main gate , and the quick salaams , the ready smiles given [him]68-lance by [the men]2022-the men , as [they]2022-the men lounged and smoked after [their]2022-the men long day on duty , soothed [his]68-lance pride . [The Captain]2639-the captain had certainly said [they]2022-the men had behaved well -- kindly , and discreetly ; but whose merit was that ? [The Englishman 's who gave the word of command]2640-the englishman 's who gave the word of command , or [his]2641-his , who had drilled [them]2022-the men to obedience , who lived with [them]2022-the men day and night ? Without such as [he]68-lance , [a native regiment]2642-a native regiment could not be managed , if [he]68-lance chose to give the word . [He]68-lance would not , of course , but if [he]68-lance chose-- [He]68-lance set [his]68-lance teeth as [he]68-lance walked out of [the Fort]3493-the fort , and met at [its]3493-the fort very gate that surging tide of [patient , eager faces]2644-patient , eager faces drifting on , and back again , aimlessly . [He]68-lance need not , as a matter of fact , have feared any further interference from [Vincent Dering]71-vincent , for the latter , being very tired after the long day in the sun , and having reason to know that part of the night time , at any rate , which is usually given to sleep would be employed in something better , had , after staving off hunger with what [the cook]4560-the cook would produce at a moment 's notice , and postponing the dinner hour , gone to sleep deliberately , advising [Lance]68-lance to do the same . But [the latter]336-the latter had , rather to [his]68-lance own surprise , found this impossible ; not even over a cigar in [the balcony]644-the balcony above [the sliding , rushing river]2648-the sliding , rushing river , the sound of which was as a rule sleep - compelling , would sleep come ; not even in the cool darkness which was settling on [Eshwara]1-eshwara , despite the curious hint of glow lingering in the sky . The air was too electrical , [he]68-lance decided . And then -- [Erda]105-erda ! [He]68-lance had slept the night before , after [she]2649-her had said good - by so carelessly , without realizing that the good - by was for ever . And [he]68-lance had not had time to think all day . But now , at rest in the cool darkness , looking from [his]68-lance lounge chair down [the river]333-the river to [that other balcony]2651-that other balcony , [he]68-lance did realize it . For ever ! Yes ! that regret was in [his]68-lance life for ever . And [he]68-lance was so young . Only twenty - five . Why had this come to [him]68-lance ? [Erda]105-erda ! [Erda,--his]265-erda,--his heart 's desire . [He]68-lance sat there voiceless , sucking mechanically at a cigar , long since gone out ; but that was as much the cry at [his]68-lance heart as if [he]68-lance had allowed [himself]68-lance a fine frenzy of despair in older fashion . And [he]68-lance imagined [her]2649-her as [he]68-lance had seen [her]2649-her -- this way , that way , every way , in an unending torture of visions -- until [he]68-lance exhausted reality , and fancy showed [her]2649-her to [him]68-lance in [her]2649-her wedding dress . And then [he]68-lance felt as if [he]68-lance could kill [the Reverend David Campbell]190-david without shame or fear . [He]68-lance was vaguely ashamed of the lack of shame , however , especially when [his]68-lance fancy led [him]68-lance into endless mishaps which might befall [a man]533-a man , especially [a missionary]3589-a missionary , before [his]68-lance wedding day . " There [they]5039-they ate [a missionary--]5040-a missionary-- "[68-lance] Yes , sometimes ; but there was not much time left for that sort of end-- What [a brute]2654-a brute [he]68-lance was , when the only thing that mattered was that [she]2649-her should be happy and content . But would [she]2649-her be so ? It went on and on and on , the controversy between [himself]68-lance and [that other self]2655-that other self , so that [he]68-lance felt worn , and harassed , and dirty , and altogether undesirable , when [Vincent]71-vincent , about nine o'clock , reappeared , dapper and scented as usual , in [his]71-vincent mess kit , and expressed surprise at finding [[his]71-vincent companion]476-his companion still undressed . [He]71-vincent was hungry as [a hunter]2657-a hunter , [he]71-vincent said ; besides [he]71-vincent wanted to have a decent interval between dinner and turning in . And that must be early , for [he]71-vincent had just heard from [the police authorities]2658-the police authorities that though everything was quiet for the night , absolutely quiet , [they]2658-the police authorities thought it would be safer to have [the Pool]2172-the pool guarded again at dawn , in case of accidents ; since [none of [the pilgrims]3444-the pilgrims]2660-none of the pilgrims , though apparently quite resigned , had as yet gone on . " [They]2658-the police authorities never do till the next day ; [Pidar Narâyan]84-pidar narâyan told [me]68-lance so , "[68-lance] commented [Lance]68-lance , crossly . " Why should [they]2658-the police authorities rake [us]5041-us up at such an unearthly hour ? Why ca n't [they]2658-the police authorities let [the people]3552-the people have a row if [they]2658-the police authorities want one ? [I]71-vincent 'd like it ; give [a fellow]1393-a fellow something to do in this beastly hole . "[71-vincent] [He]71-vincent went off to dress moodily , wishing savage wishes , so adding , perhaps , to that electricity in the air . And [Vincent]71-vincent gave [it]2662-it [his]71-vincent quota of desire also , in [his]71-vincent reckless determination to regain Paradise , as it was lost , through [a woman]3949-a woman . And that play of [Romeo]99-romeo and [Juliet]100-juliet in [the scented garden]2664-the scented garden -- [Juliet]100-juliet , whose bounty was " as boundless as the sea"--was[100-juliet] a bit of pure paradise to [him]71-vincent . [He]71-vincent had never , [he]71-vincent thought , been in love before . [He]71-vincent had never known what love was . Those other loves of [his]71-vincent had been mean , ungenerous , calculating . So [he]71-vincent was at [his]71-vincent best , [his]71-vincent brightest , during dinner . [Lance]68-lance , on the contrary , was at [his]68-lance worst , [his]68-lance dullest ; and [Vincent]71-vincent made this [his]71-vincent excuse for going to [[his]71-vincent room]2665-his room betimes . [He]71-vincent was not due at [the palace]3477-the palace till twelve , but [he]71-vincent was anxious to ensure [the coast]4881-the coast being clear , and [Lance]68-lance seemed just in the mood when [a fellow]1393-a fellow sits up sulkily , out of pure cussedness , and drinks whiskey - and - water if [he]1393-a fellow can find [a companion on whom to vent [his]1393-a fellow cavillings]2669-a companion on whom to vent his cavillings . In truth [Lance]68-lance would have liked to do so . [He]68-lance wanted to feel miserable ; but after [Vincent]71-vincent had gone , and [he]68-lance was left alone in [the balcony]644-the balcony , sleep began to assert itself . [He]68-lance found even [his]68-lance despair becoming dreamy , and being obstinate , tried to fight against the fact . The result being that [he]68-lance finally fell asleep in [his]68-lance lounge chair with a soundness and unconsciousness usually reserved for bed . Fell asleep , and promptly relaxed into content with happy dreams of [Erda]105-erda 's return to [him]68-lance ; for [his]68-lance , left to itself , was [a healthy soul]2671-a healthy soul . And so were the vast majority of those which , through patient yet eager eyes , were looking into the scarce - lit darkness of [the streets]1469-the streets , as [the pilgrims , crowded into an almost solid mass]2673-the pilgrims , crowded into an almost solid mass , seemed to slide with a slow , almost unseen movement , through [them]2673-the pilgrims , crowded into an almost solid mass . [They]2673-the pilgrims , crowded into an almost solid mass were waiting for the dawn . If nothing new came before then , [they]2673-the pilgrims , crowded into an almost solid mass would pass on towards [the ' Cradle of [the Gods]166-the gods]3399-the ' cradle of the gods . ' So , scarcely seen , restless yet restful , [their]2673-the pilgrims , crowded into an almost solid mass feet on the next rung of the golden stairs , [they]2673-the pilgrims , crowded into an almost solid mass waited . And overhead the young moon had risen with a copper - coloured edge to its crescent of light . For the glow was still in the sky , and [the troopers in [the Fort]3493-the fort]2675-the troopers in the fort , resting , after [their]2675-the troopers in the fort long day , in Indian fashion by sprawling on [their]2675-the troopers in the fort beds and gossiping , had dragged these beds into the open and discarded most of [their]2675-the troopers in the fort clothing , since the night was strangely still and warm . So even the wonder what had become of [the risaldar - sahib]2677-the risaldar - sahib was languid . For [Roshan Khân]89-roshan had not returned . And yet , as [he]89-roshan sat in [a quiet courtyard of [the city]3556-the city]2678-a quiet courtyard of the city , with closed doors , realizing how late it was growing , [he]89-roshan had no fear of further reprimand . On the contrary , [his]89-roshan pulses were bounding with the certainty that [he]89-roshan would gain praise . And there was something beyond this mere desire for personal advantage in the keen - witted diplomacy with which [he]89-roshan listened , with which [he]89-roshan suggested , with which [he]89-roshan led [the talkers]2680-the talkers on to tell what it was of the utmost importance that [he]89-roshan should know , not so much to [himself]89-roshan , as to [the Government [he]89-roshan served]3867-the government he served . For [his]89-roshan vague discontent had vanished , [his]89-roshan well - reasoned , well - founded loyalty returned at this , the first hint at anything beyond the wild , aimless intrigue with which [every Indian bazaar]2682-every indian bazaar teems . But here , in this definite plan , by the collaboration of [[his]89-roshan troopers]2683-his troopers , of liberating [fifteen hundred scoundrels,--or , at least , desperadoes,--of]2684-fifteen hundred scoundrels,--or , at least , desperadoes,--of aping the stroke of action which made the great mutiny of ' 57 possible , was something tangible . Something which , when known to [the uttermost]2685-the uttermost , must be told without delay to [[his]89-roshan superior officer]2635-his superior officer . A vast pride swept through [him]89-roshan , as , when the gongs were striking one,--short , yet with lingering vibration in the dull , still air,--he made [his]89-roshan way , fast as [he]89-roshan could , back to [the Fort]3493-the fort . Without [him]89-roshan , and such as [he]89-roshan , faithful despite limitations , what would [the Masters]4924-the masters know ? Hours before , as [he]89-roshan went out , [he]89-roshan had arranged with [Akbar Khân]110-akbar that [the palace door giving on the great square between [it]2689-the palace door giving on the great square between it and the fort and [the Fort]3493-the fort]2689-the palace door giving on the great square between it and the fort should be on the latch only , so that [he]89-roshan might slip in at any time and take [his]89-roshan chance of hiding in [the garden]433-the garden , [his]89-roshan chance of seeing [Laila]86-laila before the dawn came and [he]89-roshan had to go back to [the Fort]53-the fort . [The old sinner]629-the old sinner , indeed , had jumped at this indefinite arrangement , which bound [him]89-roshan to nothing ; which made it unnecessary for [him]89-roshan even to broach the subject of an interview to [[his]89-roshan mistress]2693-his mistress . Since what was easier to say than that it had been impossible ; as , indeed , it was ! Perhaps [Roshan Khân]89-roshan had [himself]89-roshan grasped this fact ; perhaps in insisting on this entry to [the garden]433-the garden [he]89-roshan had been backing more than [his]89-roshan own luck , and had been meditating a coup d'état of [his]89-roshan own . However that may have been , all was forgotten in [his]89-roshan newly recovered loyalty , [his]89-roshan keen ambition , as [he]89-roshan hurried back to [the Fort]3493-the fort intent on but one thing -- the forewarning and forearming of [those whom [he]89-roshan had long ago deliberately chosen as [[his]89-roshan masters]687-his masters]2696-those whom he had long ago deliberately chosen as his masters . [Some of [[his]89-roshan men]4923-his men]2698-some of his men were still lounging about on [their]2698-some of his men beds , and [he]89-roshan spoke a word to [them]2698-some of his men as [he]89-roshan passed , warning [them]2698-some of his men to be ready if wanted . So , leaving [them]2698-some of his men in sudden vague excitement , [he]89-roshan passed on to [the inner court]2700-the inner court . Here , where [[Lance Carlyon]68-lance 's small band of [Sikh pioneers]2702-sikh pioneers]2701-lance carlyon 's small band of sikh pioneers were quartered in [the long , low building in which [the fortified gateway]2704-the fortified gateway stood]2703-the long , low building in which the fortified gateway stood , [no one]3741-no one was astir . And no lights were visible in [the opposite building where [Lance]68-lance and [Vincent]71-vincent lived]2706-the opposite building where lance and vincent lived . Doubtless [everyone]749-everyone was in bed . [He]89-roshan passed on , therefore , swiftly to [the room [he]89-roshan knew to be [his]89-roshan Captain 's]2708-the room he knew to be his captain 's , and knocked . There was no answer . [He]89-roshan opened the door and looked in . [It]2708-the room he knew to be his captain 's was empty . A vague wonder assailed [him]89-roshan , and [he]89-roshan passed on to [[Lance Carlyon]68-lance 's room]2709-lance carlyon 's room . [It]2708-the room he knew to be his captain 's was empty also , and the vague uneasiness died down . [They]2701-lance carlyon 's small band of sikh pioneers must be sitting up still in [the balcony overlooking [the river]333-the river]2710-the balcony overlooking the river , where [they]2701-lance carlyon 's small band of sikh pioneers sat every day after dinner . Stupid of [him]89-roshan not to have gone [there]3509-there first ; and yet , surely , it was late . Perhaps [they]2701-lance carlyon 's small band of sikh pioneers were uneasy ; perhaps [they]2701-lance carlyon 's small band of sikh pioneers had already heard ! An open letter " On [Her]5044-her Majesty 's Service "[89-roshan] lying on the dinner table as [he]89-roshan passed through [the mess room]2713-the mess room ( which was still lit up -- sign that [the servants]2714-the servants had gone to sleep awaiting [[their]2714-the servants masters]1366-their masters ' call ) attracted [his]89-roshan attention . [He]89-roshan glanced at it , half fearing to find [himself]89-roshan forestalled by [the police authorities]2658-the police authorities . No ! It was from [them]2658-the police authorities , as [he]89-roshan had seen at once ; but it was only that notice for dawn . Ah ! what was this ? this tiny scrap of paper , which had been twisted to a cocked - hat note , lying caught in the fold of the foolscap , with the two words--"twelve o'clock"--written[3949-a woman] on it ? In [a woman]3949-a woman 's writing . [Roshan]89-roshan knew enough of invitations from [Englishwomen]4175-englishwomen to be sure of that . The vague uneasiness returned , as [he]89-roshan went on to [the balcony]644-the balcony beyond [the dining - room]2720-the dining - room . There too , the swinging lamp still burnt , and showed [him]89-roshan [Lance Carlyon]68-lance fast asleep in a lounge chair ; but [no one else]4534-no one else . Where was [Captain Dering]71-vincent ? [Captain Dering]71-vincent , who had the key of the little door in [the bastion]2604-the bastion ; [Captain Dering]71-vincent , who had had a note with " twelve o'clock "[71-vincent] in it ? A sudden thought struck [him]89-roshan . If -- if there was anything in [his]89-roshan vague fear -- then , by taking [the canoe]937-the canoe , which lay at the bottom of the stairs , [he]89-roshan could slip down stream , and see-- Forgetting everything else , [Roshan]89-roshan stole softly past [the sleeping Lance]2724-the sleeping lance , and went down [the stairs]1281-the stairs . [The canoe]937-the canoe was not there . Then [Captain Dering]71-vincent must have taken it and gone -- whither ? There was but one place whither [he]89-roshan was likely to go alone at that hour of the night ; one place , [a stair like this]2727-a stair like this leading up to [a balcony over [the river]333-the river]2728-a balcony over the river where [he]89-roshan had gone once before with [a woman]3949-a woman , [a woman in a dress which marked [her]3949-a woman for what [she]3949-a woman was , really]2731-a woman in a dress which marked her for what she was , really -- a dress that marked [her]3949-a woman secluded -- which made this , shame unutterable ! [Roshan]89-roshan 's impotent fury rose hot at the inexpressible humiliation . The thought of [Captain Dering]71-vincent and [Laila]86-laila alone in [that balcony]2732-that balcony meant but one thing to [his]89-roshan inherited ideas . No glaze of romance was possible . It was shame unutterable , irredeemable . Shame that must be revenged without delay . So , forgetting everything else in [the world]404-the world except this , [he]89-roshan passed [the sleeping Lance]68-lance once more , hurried back to [[his]89-roshan quarters]2624-his quarters for [his]89-roshan revolver , and only stopping to see that one chamber at least was loaded , made [his]89-roshan way to that door which [he]89-roshan knew would be on the latch . [That patient , eager crowd]2735-that patient , eager crowd was still thronging [the courtyard]386-the courtyard as [he]89-roshan crossed [it]386-the courtyard , pausing a moment beside the great gun which centred the union - jack of [raised paths]3886-raised paths . [The " Teacher of Religion]5045-the " teacher of religion ! "[5045-the " teacher of religion] Ay ! [they]2738-they needed [a teacher]2739-a teacher , needed a lesson ; [these aliens]2740-these aliens , [these usurpers]2741-these usurpers , [these depravers of]2742-these depravers of [women]479-women . Yet , in sober truth , [Vincent Dering]71-vincent , at that moment sitting in [the little balcony]2744-the little balcony alone with [Laila Bonaventura]86-laila , felt quite virtuous . [They]2745-they had just come in from [the garden]433-the garden , where [they]2745-they had been strolling and whispering , and now , as [they]2745-they sat together , without a word , scarcely a thought , in the faint light of the young moon and a red jewelled hand - lamp -- which [Laila]86-laila , with that unfailing instinct of [hers]86-laila for all that matched the passionate mystery of [the place]3423-the place , had set in [a carved niche]2748-a carved niche , where it looked like a votive offering to the unseen image of a saint -- [Vincent]71-vincent could feel the warm ivory of [her]86-laila cheek against [his]71-vincent own , hear the soft chink of [her]86-laila jewels as they slid towards [him]71-vincent , following the soft warm curves on which they lay . The red light of the lamp glittered faintly in red stars on the myriad facets of looking - glass with which the vaulted roof above [them]2745-they was adorned . It fell , reddening the red lights on the gold - stiffened crimson waves of [her]86-laila dress , that sent such a bewildering perfume to cloud [his]71-vincent senses with passionate content . A vast tenderness , a vast triumph , surged through [him]71-vincent at the thought of [her]86-laila . Who dared to judge [her]86-laila by the narrow standards of to - day -- [she]86-laila , who had gone back boldly to realities ! This was what [poets]2749-poets had sung since time began ; this was what [the world]404-the world had exchanged for [Paradise]9-paradise ! [Juliet]100-juliet ! [Juliet]100-juliet ! And if [he]71-vincent was [the " god of [her]86-laila idolatry]5046-the " god of her idolatry , "[86-laila] [she]86-laila was to [him]71-vincent the " dearest morsel of earth . "[71-vincent] [He]71-vincent bent and whispered the name to [her]86-laila with a kiss . And as [he]71-vincent did so , a step , swift , bold , masterful , sounded in [the passage above]2751-the passage above ; the step of one with a right to be there . [Vincent]71-vincent , startled , sat listening ; but [Laila]86-laila was on [her]86-laila feet in a second , with a reckless laugh . " [Father Laurence]197-father laurence ! "[86-laila] [she]86-laila cried . " Well ! let [him]197-father laurence come . [I]86-laila 'm not afraid ! For [he]197-father laurence loved [her]86-laila . [He]197-father laurence must remember ! "[86-laila] So , as a dim figure showed , half seen , in the archway , [she]86-laila stood like [a queen]2752-a queen , [her]86-laila hand raised , [her]86-laila head thrown back ; a sight never to be forgotten . " There is no use in being angry , [guardian]3576-guardian , "[86-laila] [she]86-laila called , in [her]86-laila full - throated voice . " It is too late for that . Remember-- "[86-laila] [She]86-laila paused , gave a slight scream , and flung [herself]86-laila before [Vincent]71-vincent . There was a flash , a second scream , and then the arches rang with the echoes of a pistol - shot . " [Laila]86-laila ! [Laila]86-laila ! "[86-laila] " [[You]89-roshan damned scoundrel]5048-you damned scoundrel ! [You]89-roshan 've killed [her]1071-the woman ! "[86-laila] " [Laila]86-laila ! [Laila]86-laila ! "[86-laila] There were two voices echoing [the woman]1071-the woman 's name , but only that one pistol - shot . Then two useless clicks of a trigger , before , with an oath , [Roshan Khân]89-roshan flung the revolver from [him]89-roshan and fled . But that pistol - shot , as it pierced the hot , sultry air in [the vaulted archways]2754-the vaulted archways , was caught by a sudden blast of warm wind , sweeping [God]96-god knows whence , to [God]96-god knows where ! and was blown out riverwards , citywards . Blown by that sudden blast , like the hot breath of [someone]498-someone 's anger , which always heralds an electrical dust - storm . One moment there is the stillness of the uttermost void brooding over [the deep]2756-the deep ; the next , causelessly , [God]96-god knows why ! the spirit moving palpably . And so it is always when the ever - recurring struggle for the right road to [that lost Paradise]2757-that lost paradise , for the right method of regaining that bartered birthright , begins afresh among [the sons of Adam]2758-the sons of adam . When [the Hosts of the Lord,--fighting]2759-the hosts of the lord,--fighting , as [men]312-men always fight , under the banner of Right , for what [they]312-men think good and true , for what seems to [them]312-men to bring [them]312-men nearer to the golden gates -- change armed peace for war . It was so now ; and [Lance Carlyon]68-lance , waking to the familiar , yet unfamiliar sound of that pistol - shot , woke also to the knowledge that [someone]498-someone had already resorted to that last argument between [man]361-man and [[his]361-man fellow]916-his fellow . Who was it ? And why ? As [he]68-lance stood , still half dazed by sleep , listening , as [one]3501-one does instinctively , for another shot to follow the first , a new sound distracted [his]68-lance attention . Was [he]68-lance still asleep and dreaming ? or was that really [Erda Shepherd]105-erda 's voice , rising towards [him]68-lance from [the sliding , unseen river]2765-the sliding , unseen river ? " [I]105-erda will come back to [you]68-lance directly , "[105-erda] it said in Urdu . The half - heard promise of the words took [him]68-lance by storm , making [him]68-lance forget the strangeness of the language . Yet even that made [his]68-lance bewilderment more utter . And all around [him]68-lance , about [him]68-lance , a mist -- or was it a cloud , or what was it?--had sprung into being . A wreath as of smoke drifted past the wide arches of [the balcony]644-the balcony , blotting out the pale shimmer of the young moon . The swinging lamp above [his]68-lance head darkened , reddened , as the dust - atoms leapt from [the earth]827-the earth into the air , obedient to the call of that mightiest force in nature which holds [the world]404-the world together , and guides it on its way among the stars . [Pidar Narâyan]84-pidar narâyan had been right ! The electrical storm had come ! But [Erda]105-erda had come with it . [He]68-lance could see [her]105-erda now , standing at the top of [the river steps]2769-the river steps , dimmed by the dust - atoms that glittered faintly in the clouded ray of the lamp ; could see [her]105-erda -- tall , slim , white -- with a red - gold ball in [her]105-erda hand . So it was only a dream ; [he]68-lance was asleep still ! The certainty of this , the knowledge that [he]68-lance would wake soon , made [him]68-lance yield to impulse , to emotion , as [he]68-lance would never have done otherwise . [He]68-lance held out [his]68-lance arms to the gracious vision , [his]68-lance voice rang with passion . " [Erda]105-erda ! [Erda]105-erda ! [You]105-erda have come back to [me!--the]5049-me!--the world 's desire -- [my]68-lance heart 's desire ! "[68-lance] And then , suddenly , [his]68-lance heart a - tremble for the first time , [he]68-lance drew back from [his]68-lance own fervour almost apologetically ; for the scared look of the face seen through those earth - atoms had brought it home to [him]68-lance that this was no dream . This was [Erda Shepherd]105-erda [herself]105-erda , [the woman who was the " dearest atom of [[God]96-god 's earth]5050-god 's earth "[105-erda] to [him]68-lance]2770-the woman who was the " dearest atom of god 's earth " to him . And [she]105-erda had come back , for what ? Not to listen to [his]68-lance passion , anyhow . " What is the matter ? "[68-lance] [he]68-lance asked briefly , sternly ; for it came home to [him]68-lance also that the cause must be grave . [She]105-erda gave a little shiver ; the hearing of that first greeting had upset [her]105-erda calm , [her]105-erda courage , at last . Yet [they]2771-they had been firm till then ; and , Heaven knows ! the long hours of slipping through [the rapids]5003-the rapids in the wake of that heaving , plunging mass of logs had been trying enough to [anyone]3948-anyone . Then for the last half hour , since [Am - ma]131-am - ma had cut [the raft]4626-the raft adrift to follow [them]2771-they at its leisure through the slacker currents , and , in obedience to [her]105-erda order , had forged ahead with [his]131-am - ma paddle , [her]105-erda anxiety had risen to fever - pitch ; since the night , so far as [she]105-erda could judge , must be waning fast , and [her]105-erda errand would be useless if [she]105-erda were not in [Eshwara]1-eshwara before the dawn . For , as [she]105-erda had listened to [Am - ma]131-am - ma 's garrulous talk while [he]68-lance steered , the conviction had grown that the danger to peace and safety -- if there was any -- lay in the future , not in the past ; that this dawn , and not yesterday 's , was to be the signal for the insensate , almost incredible attempt to wreck authority . An attempt which yet -- incredible , insensate though it be -- might bring death to -- to one [she]105-erda held very dear . [She]105-erda admitted so much now to [herself]105-erda , and , pulling that self together , looked [that dear one]2775-that dear one in the face . " There is a good deal the matter , "[105-erda] [she]105-erda said . " [You]68-lance had better call [Captain Dering]71-vincent to hear it , too ; it will save time . "[105-erda] [He]68-lance nodded acquiescence , but ere [he]68-lance left [her]105-erda , the instinct in [him]68-lance to guard [his]68-lance " dearest atom "[68-lance] to the uttermost from [others]569-others , made [him]68-lance set a chair for [her]105-erda , and , glancing round for a wrap , take the mess jacket [he]68-lance had laid aside for a smoking coat , and fold it round [her]105-erda . For the air had grown suddenly chill , as it always does in a sand - storm . " [You]105-erda must be cold in that dress , "[68-lance] [he]68-lance said . As [he]68-lance did so the daintiness of it struck [him]68-lance , the scent of the orange blossoms made [him]68-lance turn pale . Despite [his]68-lance hurry , [his]68-lance certainty that something serious was ahead , [he]68-lance paused to ask sharply : " That is [your]105-erda wedding dress , is n't it?"--[68-lance] " [I]105-erda am not married , if [you]68-lance mean that ! "[105-erda] [she]105-erda answered as sharply . Then [she]105-erda flushed up angrily , more at the comprehension shown in [her]105-erda own answer than the meaning in [his]68-lance question , and burst out : " What does it matter if [I]105-erda am -- or if it is ? Go ! [I]105-erda tell [you]68-lance , and call [Captain Dering]71-vincent ! "[105-erda] Yet , when [he]68-lance was gone , [she]105-erda lay back in the chair and shivered again ; all the more because of the unaccustomed touch about [her]105-erda throat of the gold lace on a mess jacket . How red it looked against [her]105-erda white dress ! And what a lot of little gold buttons there were at its edge : foolish , useless , little ornamental gilt buttons , round and red - gold , like-- The comparison brought back [Lance]68-lance 's cry of welcome , and made [her]105-erda realize that , quite mechanically , [she]105-erda still held in [her]105-erda hand that useless , foolish , unnecessary orange ! That , of course , was what had made [him]68-lance remember ; had made [him]68-lance say those words which had come like the writing on the wall to remind [her]105-erda of [her]105-erda own guilt . [She]105-erda flung the fruit from [her]105-erda , hastily , into [the unseen river]2777-the unseen river beyond the arches . Only just in time , [ere]2778-ere [Lance]68-lance reëntered , with a puzzled face . " [I]68-lance ca n't find [Dering]71-vincent anywhere , "[68-lance] [he]68-lance said vexedly . " [He]71-vincent is not in [[his]71-vincent room]2665-his room . Has n't been to bed , either ; though [he]71-vincent turned in early saying [he]71-vincent was half asleep . [I]68-lance wonder what is up ? Can [he]71-vincent have heard already , do [you]68-lance think ? Scarcely ; and [he]71-vincent would not have gone without waking [me]68-lance . "[68-lance] [His]68-lance surprise seemed to absorb [him]68-lance . " Then [I]105-erda must tell [you]68-lance , for there is no time to be lost , "[105-erda] interrupted [Erda]105-erda , impatiently . Yet , even in [her]105-erda strenuous desire to make [him]68-lance understand quickly , [she]105-erda did not fail to explain , breathlessly , how [she]105-erda came to be dressed as [she]105-erda was . [She]105-erda had been trying on [her]105-erda wedding dress to see if it fitted , and had gone into [the garden]433-the garden for -- for -- flowers , when [Am - ma]131-am - ma and [[his]131-am - ma raft]2780-his raft had come floating down [the river]333-the river . And was not that all true ? [she]105-erda asked [herself]105-erda passionately , as [she]105-erda told the tale . It was all of the truth , anyhow , that [he]68-lance or [anyone else]3731-anyone else was ever to know . So [she]105-erda had come to warn [them]2783-them , as [she]105-erda was . A great joy at [her]105-erda courage filled [Lance]68-lance as [he]68-lance listened , for to [most men]3736-most men the possibility of [a woman]3949-a woman acting as [a man]533-a man might act comes as a wonder . " It was awfully plucky of [you]105-erda , "[68-lance] [he]68-lance began ; but [she]105-erda cut [him]68-lance short with a question as to what was to be done now . " Warn [Dillon]69-dr. dillon , first of all , "[68-lance] [he]68-lance said readily . " [We]5052-we have a wire laid on , [you]105-erda know .
