Do [you]105-erda mind ? "[68-lance] " [I]105-erda 'll come , of course,--but [I]105-erda must make sure of [Am - ma]131-am - ma waiting first , "[105-erda] [she]105-erda added , with a ring in [her]105-erda voice ; the ring of a vigorous vitality which finds itself face to face with action . " [He]131-am - ma said [the raft]4626-the raft could n't overtake [us]5056-us for half an hour . But [he]131-am - ma must not go , anyhow , and [he]131-am - ma will want to . [I]105-erda had difficulty in getting [him]131-am - ma to leave it , as it was . But [I]105-erda had to make [him]131-am - ma . [I]105-erda had to be in time ! "[105-erda] " And [you]105-erda are -- loads of time ! "[2787-he] [he]2787-he called , as [he]2787-he ran down [the river steps]2769-the river steps before [her]105-erda , to give the order . " It is n't two o'clock yet , and-- "[2787-he] [he]2787-he paused abruptly , on seeing , to [his]2787-he surprise , that only [[Am - ma]131-am - ma 's strange craft]2789-am - ma 's strange craft lay sidling against the bottom step , over which little waves were curving hurriedly , to reach up the wall , as if the water - atoms were as restless as those of [earth]2790-earth , as eager to seek a new element . For the air was growing darker , thicker every instant with [the intruders]2791-the intruders . [He]2787-he looked round hastily , but there was no sign of [the canoe]937-the canoe anywhere . Yet [he]2787-he had seen [it]937-the canoe moored to [its]937-the canoe ring before dinner ! [Vincent]71-vincent must have taken it . [Whither]258-whither ? An answer leapt to [Lance]68-lance 's mind , and [he]2787-he flushed up , even in the dark , redly . If this was so -- what the deuce was to be done ? There was an added confusion , an added responsibility in [his]2787-he face as [he]2787-he ran back to where [Erda]105-erda stood waiting [him]2787-he , and , catching up a lamp from the mess table , started with [her]105-erda close at [his]2787-he heels for [the office]5053-the office . " That is the first thing , anyhow ! "[2787-he] [he]2787-he muttered , half to [himself]2787-he . " [Dillon]69-dr. dillon must be warned-- "[2787-he] " And perhaps [Captain Dering]71-vincent will be back by then , "[105-erda] [she]105-erda suggested cheerfully , as , with the mess jacket worn as it should be for greater convenience of action and greater protection ( [she]105-erda had slipped [her]105-erda arms into it , deliberately , while waiting for [Lance]68-lance ) , [she]105-erda followed in the little halo of dull , red light cast by the lamp through the dust - mist . [The courtyard]386-the courtyard was still without sign of life ; for there was nothing to guard [here]3395-here . [The massive gates of [the citadel]2797-the citadel]2796-the massive gates of the citadel once closed , and [a sentry]2609-a sentry outside [the wicket]2799-the wicket , there could be no fear of secret comings and goings . " [I]68-lance hope to [God]96-god [he]68-lance may , "[68-lance] said [Lance]68-lance , ahead , and [his]68-lance tone made [the girl]481-the girl wonder . [His]68-lance face , too , surprised [her]481-the girl , as , sitting down to the instrument , [he]68-lance signalled for attention . No doubt when time is an object , there must always be a sense of strain in that pause before the answering tinkle comes to tell that [a human hand and brain]2801-a human hand and brain is at the other end of the thin wire which means so much , but there was more than that in [Lance Carlyon]68-lance 's frown . In truth , as [he]68-lance waited , [he]68-lance was not thinking so much of what would happen if the communication was interrupted , but what was to be done if it was not . Thinking that [he]68-lance must , somehow , warn [Vincent]71-vincent . Thinking how awkward it would be for [him]68-lance if there was a row , and [he]68-lance absent , as it were , without leave ! So it was [Erda]105-erda who recalled [him]68-lance to the wider issue . " What are [you]68-lance going to do , if [Dr. Dillon]69-dr. dillon does n't hear ? "[481-the girl] [She]481-the girl had to raise [her]481-the girl voice a little , for something -- either coming wind or far - distant thunder -- had brought a curious , faint reverberation to the air . It seemed to come from all quarters , scarcely distinguishable , yet unmistakable , like the roll of a half - muffled drum , or a deep organ note quivering into silence . The darkness all about [them]2802-them grew thicker and thicker . [Lance]68-lance , close beside [her]481-the girl in that red lamp circle , showed as if seen through gauze . How unreal it all was ! [Herself]481-the girl , most of all , in a mess jacket , and , of course -- but this thought came second -- [her]481-the girl wedding dress ! And then it struck [her]481-the girl that [she]481-the girl , [herself]481-the girl , was more unreal than anything else . To be there at dead of night , feeling no fear , only a sort of savage interest-- " But if [he]68-lance does n't hear , "[481-the girl] [she]481-the girl persisted , " [you]68-lance will have to go down [the river]333-the river and warn [him]68-lance . "[68-lance] [He]68-lance nodded . And yet [his]68-lance thought went first to the fact that , if [he]68-lance had to do this , if [Roshan Khân]89-roshan had to be left in charge of the relief , it would be still more awkward for [Vincent Dering]71-vincent . Tring - a - tring - tring ! The answering tinkle brought a little breath of joy to [them]2802-them both ; but [Erda]105-erda felt inclined to stamp [her]105-erda feet at the slow precision with which [Lance]68-lance -- who had to remember each equivalent sign -- spelt out [his]68-lance message . [He]68-lance could not be quicker , of course , and yet surely [he]68-lance might ! [She]105-erda longed to snatch at the handles [herself]105-erda , though [she]105-erda could not signal at all . "[68-lance] " Now ! what is to be done next ? "[68-lance] " [Roshan Khân]89-roshan -- he'll get [the men]2022-the men together , "[68-lance] answered [Lance]68-lance , already on [his]68-lance way to the wicket in the gate . To [his]68-lance surprise , it was closed . [He]68-lance knocked , no answer came . [Erda]105-erda , holding the lamp , looked at [him]68-lance startled . " [Sentry]266-sentry ! "[68-lance] [he]68-lance called . " [Sentry]266-sentry ! Open the door ! Miracle ! ' "[68-lance] It was the password for the night , given by [Captain Dering]71-vincent in contemptuous memory of the day ; but it produced no result . The wicket remained obstinately closed . " [They]2022-the men 've locked [us]5059-us in ! "[105-erda] whispered [Erda]105-erda ; the lowering of [her]105-erda voice being due to a swift instinct that the less fuss made the better ; the less chance of interruption . [Lance]68-lance bent [his]68-lance ear to the keyhole to listen . Those dull , muffled reverberations -- either distant thunder , or faint , ineffective explosions of electricity close at hand -- were louder now ; but [he]68-lance could hear no sound above [them]2803-them . [He]68-lance shook [his]68-lance head . [Erda]105-erda had the lamp on the ground in a second , and was beside it , [her]105-erda red - gold hair in the dust , as [she]105-erda peered through a three - inch iron grating between the iron - rimmed door and the iron lintel . When [she]105-erda rose up [her]105-erda face was like the iron also . " [They]2022-the men 've trapped [us]5059-us ! "[105-erda] [she]105-erda whispered . " There is [a sentry outside]5060-a sentry outside -- [I]105-erda saw [his]5060-a sentry outside feet . Come away , and let [us]5059-us settle what to do . " That 's quite enough , "[105-erda] [she]105-erda said ; but [she]105-erda said it with a smile . That vigorous delight in action which [some women]483-some women feel was making [her]483-some women blood race through [her]483-some women veins . " Now what 's to be done ? "[105-erda] [she]105-erda said swiftly , as [she]105-erda put the lamp down on the mess table again . " Let 's think hard . "[105-erda] The gate was closed against interference with -- with -- something ! That was evident . Proof positive , therefore , that Am - ma 's tale was true . So it followed that the most urgent need for help was at [the gaol]1501-the gaol . But how to reach [it]1501-the gaol , and with whom ? [Lance]68-lance 's thoughts turned instantly to [Roshan Khân]89-roshan . Was [he]89-roshan -- could [he]89-roshan be in the plot ? Surely not . Yet with or without [his]89-roshan knowledge , [the outer court]2806-the outer court was in the hands of [rebels who thought [[their]2807-rebels who thought their english officers were caught like rats in a trap English officers]2808-their english officers were caught like rats in a trap]2807-rebels who thought their english officers were caught like rats in a trap ; for , of course , [they]2807-rebels who thought their english officers were caught like rats in a trap did not know [Dering]71-vincent was absent . And so it was . [He]89-roshan and [[his]89-roshan pioneers]2809-his pioneers -- twenty or thereabouts -- were in a trap . What could [they]2807-rebels who thought their english officers were caught like rats in a trap do to get out of it ? [Their]2807-rebels who thought their english officers were caught like rats in a trap arms , scaling ladders , everything , were in [the outside courtyard]2810-the outside courtyard . What would be the use , either , of trying to force the door ? Mere waste of time . The thing required was to prevent [those fifteen hundred men with a criminal past being let loose on [Eshwara]1-eshwara]2811-those fifteen hundred men with a criminal past being let loose on eshwara , let loose -- as [men like [them]2807-rebels who thought their english officers were caught like rats in a trap had been in the Mutiny]2812-men like them had been in the mutiny -- to give a lead over . And that -- how was that to be done ? [He]89-roshan looked across to [Erda]105-erda , and took sudden comfort in the quick intelligence of [her]105-erda face . " [You]89-roshan had better take [my]105-erda place with [Am - ma]3733-am - ma , "[105-erda] [she]105-erda said sharply . " Go down stream to [the spit]614-the spit , cut across by [the mission house]3764-the mission house , and chance getting over to [the police camp]5067-the police camp . "[105-erda] [He]89-roshan had thought of this before . [The extra police]2813-the extra police , with [[their]2813-the extra police two officers , who had come over to see the festival through peacefully]2814-their two officers , who had come over to see the festival through peacefully , were encamped above [the boat - bridge]2815-the boat - bridge and though , of course , [most of [the men]2022-the men]2816-most of the men would be scattered on duty through [the town]331-the town , even some help would be better than none . " But [you]105-erda , "[89-roshan] [he]89-roshan began-- " [I]89-roshan 'll stay [here]3395-here . [They]2821-your sikhs wo n't try to come in -- yet a while . "[89-roshan] " [I]89-roshan would n't mind [your]105-erda being alone , "[89-roshan] [he]89-roshan put in , " but [[my]89-roshan Sikhs--]5069-my sikhs-- "[89-roshan] [[Your]89-roshan Sikhs]2821-your sikhs , " [she]105-erda echoed . "[89-roshan] Are [they]2821-your sikhs here ? Then why-- ? " "[2821-your sikhs] [They]2821-your sikhs have no arms -- [I]0-i could find some , perhaps-- " --His words -- both [their]5070-their words -- jostled each other in sheer haste . "[2821-your sikhs] Yes ! then why do n't [you]89-roshan call [them?"--]2821-your sikhs "[89-roshan] How can [I]0-i use [them]2821-your sikhs -- trapped like a rat . [They]2821-your sikhs -- [they]2821-your sikhs might be worse than useless , without something to do -- without a lead over -- don't [you]89-roshan see?--and there is nothing-- " --"Nothing[89-roshan] ! " [she]105-erda echoed , almost savagely , as [she]105-erda clasped and unclasped [her]105-erda hands , dragging the fingers through each other , in sheer straining after some thought on which to clutch , in cruel whipping and spurring of [her]105-erda wits against that inaction . Nothing ! Nothing ! The word seemed to fill [the world]404-the world . Nothing in [earth]2790-earth or air or fire or-- "[89-roshan] Stay ! " [she]105-erda cried , with a gasp . "[89-roshan] [The raft]4626-the raft ! [The raft]4626-the raft ! [Am - ma]3733-am - ma shall fetch it -- it must be close by , now . There will be [room]2825-room . [It]4626-the raft can float down to opposite [the gaol]1501-the gaol . " [He]89-roshan stared at [her]105-erda as [she]105-erda stood in [her]105-erda white , and scarlet , and gold . "[4626-the raft] By [Jove]76-jove ! " [he]89-roshan said softly "[76-jove] by [Jove]76-jove , [you]76-jove 've got it ! " The next instant [he]89-roshan was off to rouse [[his]89-roshan men]4923-his men , and [she]105-erda was on the bottom step giving [Am - ma]131-am - ma [his]89-roshan orders , short , sharp , clear . But when [Lance]68-lance came back again to look out what arms and ammunition [he]89-roshan could lay hands on , [he]89-roshan found [her]105-erda , in [[his]89-roshan room]2665-his room , sorting cartridges as if [she]105-erda had done it all [her]105-erda life ; and [her]105-erda face turned to [him]89-roshan all aglow and splendid . "[76-jove] [We]2827-we shall manage it ! Am - [ma]2828-he 's gone . [He]2828-he did n't want to , but [I]0-i told [him]2828-he [I]0-i 'd kill [the baby]2829-the baby if [he]2828-he did n't . [I]0-i suppose it was wrong,"--though [[her]105-erda woman]1139-her woman 's tongue sought speech , [[her]105-erda woman]1139-her woman 's hands stuck to [their]3436-people work--"but[0-i] [I]0-i could n't help it . [I]0-i felt so savage . " "[0-i] [You]0-i are very brave , " [he]0-i said simply . "[0-i] Brave ! " [she]105-erda echoed . "[0-i] Why not ? [People]3436-people talk as if [women]479-women always had to try and not be afraid ; but [we]2832-we are not all like that . [Some of [us]2832-we]2833-some of us want to fight . [I]0-i do , always . " [She]105-erda looked it , as , when all was ready , [she]105-erda leant , straining [her]105-erda eyes into the darkness for a hint of [Am - ma]131-am - ma 's return . "[0-i] [He]2834-he must come , " [she]105-erda muttered to [herself]105-erda , "[2834-he] [he]2834-he shall come ! " And [he]2834-he did . A bigger wave came sweeping up to the wall as [a herald , and then a voice calling for a rope]5077-a herald , and then a voice calling for a rope . [Half a dozen]5078-half a dozen were ready posted in [the men]2022-the men 's hands from various points of vantage . [They]5078-half a dozen flew outwards ; one , from [Am - ma]131-am - ma 's hands inwards to [a group holding a lantern on the steps]5080-a group holding a lantern on the steps . So , with a silent haul , [the pioneers]5081-the pioneers had [the raft]4626-the raft stopped , and sidling slowly back to mooring against the wall . Then [Lance]68-lance turned to [Erda]105-erda hesitating , divided between [his]68-lance loyalty to [Vincent]71-vincent , and to [her]105-erda . "[0-i] [The palace]3477-the palace ought to be warned , " [he]0-i said briefly--"if[0-i] [I]0-i go there ahead on Am - [[ma]2836-ma 's craft]2837-ma 's craft , [I]0-i could pick [you]2838-you up on [your]2838-you way down . Could [you]2838-you manage ? " [She]105-erda gave a look round on [the men , eager with the sudden excitement , with the rush , with the very novelty of it all]5083-the men , eager with the sudden excitement , with the rush , with the very novelty of it all , and laughed -- positively laughed . "[2838-you] Manage ? Yes ! of course [I]0-i can manage -- [havildar]2839-havildar ! see those cartridges are put well back out of the wet -- stay ! bring down that table , [someone]498-someone , and give [it]2841-it a lash-- " Yet , despite this absolute lack of fear , despite the fact that [she]105-erda evidently wanted and desired no more consideration than [a man]533-a man , [Lance]68-lance felt a wild dislike to leaving [her]105-erda there alone , as [he]0-i stepped on to [Am - ma]131-am - ma 's skin craft , and , edging [his]0-i way along by the wall , prepared to drift down to [the palace balcony]5085-the palace balcony . It was mirk dark now , and [he]0-i had no fear of being seen by [the crowd]4412-the crowd on [the bathing steps]396-the bathing steps and [the courtyard]386-the courtyard , though [he]0-i punted [his]0-i way with the paddle shaft within a yard or two of [the shore]3732-the shore ; for [he]0-i wanted to judge how far excitement had spread , how far [the crowd]4412-the crowd was aware of what was coming at dawn . To judge by appearances , not at all . There was no more restlessness , no more movement than was inevitable in such a concourse of [men]312-men , [women]479-women , and [children]3408-children . Here and there files of shadowy forms drifted about , but the most of [them]4412-the crowd , seen by the little lights set on the ground beside [each group]5094-each group , were in heaps , like the heaps of dead on a battle - field , huddled up on each other , sleeping , resting , indistinguishable , shrouded in [their]4412-the crowd shawls , waiting for the dawn to come . And , above the soft , yet increasing murmur of the still windless storm , came a softer murmuring of prayers , a weird low chanting . [The Hosts of [the Lord]3426-the lord]3425-the hosts of the lord had not yet risen to battle . [The Spirit]267-the spirit had not moved ; the Word had not been made manifest . [The palace]3477-the palace , also , lay as yet undisturbed , unseen , in the darkness . Except for a glimmer of red light just above [the river]333-the river , a paler glimmer closer at hand . The red light must be by the stairs for which [he]0-i was steering . The other?-- [He]0-i did not know , but as [he]0-i slipped past [it]5099-it another murmuring as of prayer seemed to come from within . It must come from [the chapel]1291-the chapel ; if so , then [Pidar Narâyan]84-pidar narâyan must be awake also . [He]0-i felt a certain relief at the thought when [he]0-i caught sight of [the canoe]937-the canoe at the bottom of the steps . Then [Vincent]71-vincent , as [he]0-i had feared , was there ; but not on the errand [he]0-i had feared , if [Pidar Narâyan]84-pidar narâyan knew of it . So , mooring [[his]0-i strange craft]5102-his strange craft to [the canoe]937-the canoe , [he]0-i ran up the stairs eagerly . [Father Ninian]247-father ninian had been awake all night . [He]247-father ninian had been vaguely uneasy all day , conscious , with that fine perception of [his]247-father ninian , that something was amiss . But it was no fear of what might happen which had kept [him]247-father ninian watching when [others]569-others slept . It was the memory of something which had happened ; for , by a coincidence that for more than fifty years had never lost its mystical significance for [Ninian Bruce]81-father ninian -- sentimentalist as [he]81-father ninian was to [his]81-father ninian finger tips -- the night of the Vaisakh festival , when [the pilgrims]3444-the pilgrims watched for the dawn to guide [them]3444-the pilgrims on [their]3444-the pilgrims way to [the ' Cradle of [the Gods]166-the gods]3399-the ' cradle of the gods , ' was to [him]81-father ninian , personally , [the saddest and gladdest of the whole year]5107-the saddest and gladdest of the whole year . Since it was the night on which [he]81-father ninian had sinned the great sin of [his]81-father ninian life , and repented of it , even in the sinning . And that sinning , that repenting , was no slight thing to [him]81-father ninian . It was [the man]3467-the man [himself]3467-the man ; for the passion that was in [him]81-father ninian in [his]81-father ninian youth was in [him]81-father ninian in [his]81-father ninian old age . It had only changed its dwelling - place . [It]5109-it had fled from the senses , and found refuge in the emotions . In a way , indeed , by thus seeking freedom from it , [he]81-father ninian had fallen into a greater thraldom , so that [his]81-father ninian whole life had been as much swayed by this renunciation of [a woman]3949-a woman as it would have been by [her]3949-a woman possession . Old as [he]81-father ninian was , this very night had brought [him]81-father ninian -- with the thought that Death could not delay much longer , and that next Vaisakh festival might find [him]81-father ninian [no lonely watcher]5111-no lonely watcher -- that thrill of self - absorption in another self , that claim for all , which is the essence of passion . For [this woman]5112-this woman , waiting for [him]81-father ninian in [the land where there is no marrying or giving in marriage]5113-the land where there is no marrying or giving in marriage , was still [a woman]3949-a woman ; still [the one of all [[God]96-god 's creatures whom [he]81-father ninian claimed , and who claimed [him]81-father ninian , even as [the first woman]5117-the first woman claimed [the first man]5118-the first man in [Paradise]9-paradise]5116-god 's creatures whom he claimed , and who claimed him , even as the first woman claimed the first man in paradise]5115-the one of all god 's creatures whom he claimed , and who claimed him , even as the first woman claimed the first man in paradise . So [he]81-father ninian had passed the night watches of the Festival of Spring : as [he]81-father ninian had always passed [them]5119-them . Partly in [[his]81-father ninian room]2665-his room , [that room made holy by [her]5112-this woman presence in [his]81-father ninian heart]5121-that room made holy by her presence in his heart , partly in [the chapel]1291-the chapel , made holy by the Bodily Presence of [Him]81-father ninian for Whose sake [he]81-father ninian had renounced [her]5112-this woman . [The two holinesses]5123-the two holinesses were inextricably mixed in [Pidar Narâyan]84-pidar narâyan 's mind . [He]81-father ninian had finished one of the masses for the repose of [a sinning yet sainted soul]5124-a sinning yet sainted soul , and , before repeating the next , was confessing [his]81-father ninian own repentance in [[his]81-father ninian room]2665-his room , when that hasty footstep along [the passage]446-the passage , which alarmed [those two lovers in [the balcony nearer [the garden]433-the garden]5128-the balcony nearer the garden]5127-those two lovers in the balcony nearer the garden , had resounded through the arches . It had disturbed , but not startled [him]81-father ninian , its very boldness reassuring [him]81-father ninian of its right to be there . Probably it was [some messenger from [the police camp]5067-the police camp or [the Fort]3493-the fort]5130-some messenger from the police camp or the fort . So [he]81-father ninian had risen from [his]81-father ninian knees calmly and passed into [the chapel]1291-the chapel , which lay between [[his]81-father ninian room]2665-his room and [the balcony]644-the balcony , in order to see who it could be . For the candles were lit on the Altar and sent a faint light into [the vaulted passage beyond]5136-the vaulted passage beyond . It was as [he]81-father ninian paused , in passing , to do homage to that Bodily Presence upon the Altar , which was ready -- as [he]81-father ninian was in [his]81-father ninian robes -- for the service of love which was to [him]81-father ninian , as [a priest]5137-a priest , [his]81-father ninian duty , as [a man]533-a man a joy unspeakable , that the pistol - shot came clamouring through the arches , followed by those despairing cries . What they were [he]81-father ninian could not distinguish , but that they were urgent was unmistakable , and had [he]81-father ninian been young as [he]81-father ninian had been on that night long years ago in [the balcony above the pale flood of [the Tiber]22-the tiber]5139-the balcony above the pale flood of the tiber , [he]81-father ninian could not have been quicker to reach [the armoury]5140-the armoury , seize the long rapier , which [he]81-father ninian had not used , save in play , since those ruffling days in [Rome]4-rome , and run out into [the wide , dim passage]5141-the wide , dim passage whence the sound had reached [him]81-father ninian . None too soon ! [Someone]498-someone was already flying down it . [He]81-father ninian pulled [himself]81-father ninian up for attack , but the figure ere [he]81-father ninian could lunge at it was past [him]81-father ninian , desperate , indifferent , flinging [him]81-father ninian against the wall as it continued its reckless way to the outer door , where , with swift opening and closing , it disappeared into [the crowded courtyard]5143-the crowded courtyard , out of sight -- beyond recall ! [He]81-father ninian stood for a moment , stupefied . What was [Roshan Khân]89-roshan doing [there]3509-there ? For that faint light from [the Altar]5145-the altar had given [him]81-father ninian a glimpse of a familiar , dark face , [Roshan Khân]89-roshan 's without a doubt ! "[86-laila] [Laila]86-laila ! [Laila]86-laila ! " The cry was clearer this time and the blood left [his]81-father ninian fine old face in sudden doubt as [he]81-father ninian turned swiftly to [his]81-father ninian left . Turned , and saw a faint red glow through an arch far down [the passage]446-the passage . That was the arch leading down into [the balcony]644-the balcony that was never lit up -- that was never to be lit up because of something that had happened there long ago -- because of the something which had begun a tragedy . Why was it lit up ? A stronger fear caught at [his]81-father ninian heart . Could Laila?--No!--impossible ! [He]81-father ninian ran on , and the next moment was realizing that some tragedy had ended in [that balcony]2732-that balcony . But what ? Who was [the woman in native dress who stood with [a man]533-a man 's arm around [her]5149-the woman in native dress who stood with a man 's arm around her]5149-the woman in native dress who stood with a man 's arm around her -- [a man in a scarlet and gold mess jacket]5151-a man in a scarlet and gold mess jacket ? [Ah!--that]5152-ah!--that was [Captain Dering]71-vincent , undoubtedly . But [the woman]1071-the woman ? [The woman in scarlet and gold]5154-the woman in scarlet and gold also -- God in Heaven!--had the dead-- As [he]81-father ninian stared , the long , supple limbs , so clearly outlined under their cunningly contrived draperies , seemed to lose themselves in the colour , the glitter of rich stuff ; one white arm , losing its hold on a cuff of scarlet and gold , swung back helplessly , and [Vincent Dering]71-vincent , with a passionate entreaty to [[his]71-vincent darling]5155-his darling not to be afraid , to look up , and tell [him]71-vincent where [she]5155-his darling was hurt , sank to one knee the better to support what [he]71-vincent held . And so the face , tilted backwards over [his]71-vincent shoulder , came in view . [Laila]86-laila ! For an instant [Ninian Bruce]81-father ninian stood bewildered . Then all [his]81-father ninian youth , the pride of birth , the dash , and the fire which had made [that youth]5156-that youth what it had been , rose up in [him]81-father ninian . The blood surged back to [his]81-father ninian face in wild anger , in savage sense of insult , and desire for revenge . "[86-laila] How dare [you]2842-you ! " [he]81-father ninian cried , clenching [his]81-father ninian hand on [his]81-father ninian sword . "[2842-you] [You]2842-you shall answer for this , [sir]3491-sir ! How do [you]2842-you come to be here , at this time of night , and why ? " [Vincent]71-vincent , who at the first word had given a hurried glance to see who [the speaker]367-the speaker was , then returned to [his]71-vincent task with the indifference of one absolutely preoccupied , held up [his]71-vincent hand passionately against more . "[2842-you] Don't -- and do n't preach , for God 's sake , [old man]4506-old man ! " [he]71-vincent cried recklessly . "[4506-old man] Come and help , if [you]4506-old man like . Some brute -- Oh , curse [him]2845-him ! curse [him]2845-him ! " [His]71-vincent one trembling hand , for the other was round [her]4506-old man , supporting [her]4506-old man , was busy with the quaint , jewelled clasps of the scented corselet , which was crimsoning deeper with another dye . "[2845-him] It 's too late for preaching , " [he]71-vincent muttered , half to himself,--"too[2845-him] late ! too late ! " The words seemed to stun [[his]71-vincent hearer]1660-his hearer into silence . [He]71-vincent stood bewildered . Too late for what ? And now , roused by that pistol - shot also , [another old man , who had carefully hidden [himself]5159-another old man , who had carefully hidden himself away from the possibility of being found by roshan khân , on the rage for an impossible interview away from the possibility of being found by [Roshan Khân]89-roshan , on the rage for an impossible interview]5159-another old man , who had carefully hidden himself away from the possibility of being found by roshan khân , on the rage for an impossible interview ; who had counted , with malicious cunning , on the cooling effect of a useless waiting in [the garden]433-the garden till dawn should make it necessary for [hot - blooded lovers]5161-hot - blooded lovers to return to [the Fort]3493-the fort , stole like [a thief]1778-a thief to [the balcony]644-the balcony . What could have happened ? The only likely trouble which had occurred to [his]71-vincent vast experience had been the possibility of [Roshan Khân]89-roshan seeking the interview [upstairs]3544-upstairs . And for that very reason had not [he]71-vincent , [Akbar Khân]110-akbar , felt it [his]71-vincent duty to sleep outside [[his]71-vincent mistress]2693-his mistress 's door ? What more could [faithful servitude]5167-faithful servitude be expected to do ? But this ! What was this ? [His]71-vincent charge had stolen a march upon [him]71-vincent . Old as [he]71-vincent was in the care of frail womanhood , [he]71-vincent had been imposed upon ! Then , as [he]71-vincent crept round a pillar craftily , the sight of [Pidar Narâyan]84-pidar narâyan , in [his]84-pidar narâyan priestly robes , made [the old sinner]629-the old sinner throw up [his]629-the old sinner hands and grovel in the dust . "[4971-this slave] [This slave]4971-this slave knew nothing ! " [he]71-vincent mumbled , gasping . "[4971-this slave] This was unknown . And for the other , [I]0-i told [him]4971-this slave it was too soon , too soon,--far too soon . " Too soon , and too late ! What did it all mean ? [Father Ninian]81-father ninian stood helpless , paralyzed ; but [Vincent]71-vincent caught at the words . "[1012-the other] [The other]1012-the other ! " [he]71-vincent echoed . "[1012-the other] [[You]2848-you black devil]2849-you black devil ! who was the other ? Who was [that man]4278-that man ? Curse [him]4278-that man ! " [He]71-vincent paused , for [Laila]86-laila opened [her]86-laila eyes . "[4278-that man] It was [Roshan Khân]89-roshan , " [she]86-laila said , with a smile , that half - amused , half - mysterious smile . "[89-roshan] [He]89-roshan gave [me]0-i the dress , [you]2848-you know , and [I]0-i think [he]89-roshan wanted [me]0-i -- to marry [him]89-roshan . Hush ! what 's the use of being angry -- now ? " [She]86-laila checked [his]71-vincent incredulous outcry , and [her]86-laila hand hesitated up to [his]71-vincent trembling fingers , and held them back from [their]5169-their task . "[89-roshan] Do n't , " [she]86-laila went on ; "[89-roshan] [I]0-i 'd rather -- [you]2848-you did n't waste time . [I]0-i want [you]2848-you to look at [me]0-i -- only [me]0-i -- [me]0-i , [myself]0-i . Ah ! that 's nice ! " There was an instant 's silence ; then [her]86-laila eyes wandered to [his]71-vincent cuff as it rested on [her]86-laila corselet , and [she]86-laila smiled again . "[2851-we] [We]2851-we match , do n't [we]2851-we ? [I]0-i 'm glad . Besides , it wo n't stain much . [I]0-i expect -- that 's why [soldiers]4773-soldiers wear red , is n't it ? " The deadly realism roused [Vincent]71-vincent to a sort of fury at [his]71-vincent own helplessness . But what could [a man]533-a man do , caught in a second by Fate to be [chief actor]5171-chief actor in a scene like this , where [he]533-a man was lost,--lost utterly ? And [those two fools]5172-those two fools looking on -- doing nothing ! "[4773-soldiers] At least , in common charity , [you]2848-you might help . [You]2848-you 're something of [a doctor]1737-a doctor ! " [he]71-vincent cried passionately . "[2848-you] [We]2851-we can settle scores afterwards , [you]2848-you and [I]0-i , ca n't [we]2851-we ? But now [you]2848-you might help [her]2854-she . " "[2854-she] What did [she]2854-she say ? " asked [Father Ninian]81-father ninian , tonelessly . [He]81-father ninian had caught a word or two , and [their]5173-their triviality , in the face of what had happened -- a triviality common in [those who have been struck down]5174-those who have been struck down as [she]2854-she had been , almost painlessly -- had but increased [his]81-father ninian bewilderment . "[2854-she] What does it mean ? How do [you]2848-you come [here]3395-here ? [I]0-i must know , first . " [The girl]481-the girl had turned [her]481-the girl face quickly to the new voice ; and , after vainly trying to rise , lay back breathlessly . "[71-vincent] Tell [him]2856-he , [Vincent]71-vincent ; [he]2856-he 's [Father Laurence]197-father laurence . Remember -- [he]2856-he must know -- and -- and [I]0-i -- can't-- " "[71-vincent] Then here it is , [sir]3491-sir ! " broke in [Vincent]71-vincent , brutally . "[3491-sir] If [you]3491-sir will wait to know , when every moment is precious . [We]2858-we love [each other]3586-each other -- [you've]2860-you've done it in [your]3491-sir time , [I]0-i 'm told ! [I]0-i 've been coming [here]3395-here , night after night , to see [her]2862-she ; [she]2862-she wears that dress to please [me]0-i -- there ! Now [you]3491-sir 've got it ! And to - night , [some devil]2863-some devil -- [she]2862-she says [Roshan Khân]89-roshan , but [she]2862-she 's dreaming ; what can [he]2856-he have to do with it?--stood there and fired -- at [me]0-i , [I]0-i think ; but [she]2862-she flung [herself]2862-she -- [Ah]2864-ah ! [Laila]86-laila , [[my]0-i darling]2865-my darling , why did [you]86-laila ? Now , will that satisfy [you]86-laila -- [you]86-laila -- [you--]86-laila " "[86-laila] Hush ! " came [Laila]86-laila 's voice--"there[2856-he] is no use in being angry . Besides , [he]2856-he understands ; [he]2856-he knows what it is to be in love quite well . Do n't [you]86-laila , [guardian]3576-guardian ? [You]86-laila loved [her]2862-she , did n't [you]86-laila ? [Margherita]147-margherita , [I]0-i mean-- " [She]2862-she wandered off into [Italian]56-italian -- the language [they]5176-they always spoke , and [her]2862-she rich voice dulled , died away , as the faintness returned . "[0-i] For God 's sake , [sir]3491-sir , bring the light , if [you]3491-sir wo n't do anything else ! " cried [Vincent]71-vincent , wildly . "[2862-she] [She]2862-she has fainted , [I]0-i think -- [I]0-i ca n't see -- it is so dark . For God 's sake , [sir]3491-sir , the light at least ! " The light at least ! As [Father Ninian]81-father ninian mechanically took the red lamp from its niche [he]3491-sir felt that [he]3491-sir needed no more light than those words , "[3491-sir] [he]3491-sir understands , " had sent into [his]3491-sir very soul . Yes , [he]3491-sir knew what love was . But [he]3491-sir knew also -- it came home to [him]3491-sir in a second -- that [his]3491-sir love , even after all these years , differed not at all from [this girl]484-this girl 's . [He]3491-sir heard it in [her]484-this girl voice -- that voice so strangely like that other voice -- which [he]3491-sir remembered -- oh ! so well ! "[3491-sir] Take off the shade , " said [Vincent]71-vincent , "[3491-sir] it makes everything so -- so red -- [you]3491-sir -- [you]3491-sir ca n't see the truth . " [He]3491-sir shivered as [he]3491-sir spoke . But that first look at [the girl]481-the girl had been enough for [Pidar Narâyan]84-pidar narâyan . It had roused [him]3491-sir , [his]3491-sir apathy was gone . [He]3491-sir thrust the lamp into [Vincent]71-vincent 's trembling hands without a word , and [his]3491-sir own steady ones -- the hands which had not touched [their]5179-their kind , except to heal body or soul , since [they]5179-their had said farewell to [a woman]3949-a woman -- took up the task . So for a few minutes there was silence , but for [the old pantaloon]536-the old pantaloon 's ceaseless mumblings as [he]3491-sir rocked [himself]3491-sir backwards and forwards . [He]3491-sir had meant no harm , [he]3491-sir protested -- [he]3491-sir had conducted more affairs of the kind to a decent ending than [he]3491-sir could well remember -- [no one]3741-no one could be more discreet -- accidents would happen-- "[3491-sir] [She]2869-her is shot through the lungs , " said [Father Ninian]81-father ninian , breaking the silence . "[2869-her] There is very little to be done -- [I]0-i -- [I--]0-i " [He]0-i would have said "[0-i] fear , " but for [Vincent]71-vincent 's face of anguish . What right had [he]71-vincent to feel sorrow?--he , [the man who had brought this about]5183-the man who had brought this about . "[0-i] Still , [I]0-i will try . [Akbar]110-akbar ! bring the candles from the altar . Stay ! [she]2869-her had better go [there]3509-there . It will save time . [You]110-akbar two can carry [her]2869-her . " But [Vincent]71-vincent had [her]2869-her in [his]71-vincent arms , with a brief "[110-akbar] Where ? " "[110-akbar] [The chapel]1291-the chapel -- the lights are lit . Lay [her]2869-her on the cushions before the altar . [I]0-i will be with [you]110-akbar again directly . " When [he]71-vincent returned from [[his]71-vincent room]2665-his room with lint and bandages [she]2869-her was lying there as [he]71-vincent had directed , [her]2869-her long red skirt trailing down the white steps . "[0-i] The candles , please,--the smaller ones , [Akbar,--and]268-akbar,--and place them at [her]2869-her head . [They]2872-they will give [me]0-i a better light . " [Vincent]71-vincent shivered again at the sight ; [she]2869-her looked already dead , with those tall tapers about [her]2869-her . Ah ! what did it all mean ? Was [he]71-vincent dreaming ? How was it possible ? The wild improbability of it stunned [him]71-vincent ; when not three hours ago [he]71-vincent had had a sherry - and - bitters before dinner ! The curious irrelevance of [his]71-vincent thoughts made [him]71-vincent feel as if [he]71-vincent must wake soon . Yet there [she]2869-her lay . [Laila]86-laila , whom [he]71-vincent loved ! "[2869-her] Is [she]2869-her -- is [she--]2869-her " [he]71-vincent began . "[2869-her] Not dead , if [you]2873-you mean that , " replied [Father Ninian]81-father ninian quietly . "[2873-you] But [she]2869-her will not live an hour . " There was no mincing matters between [these two men]5185-these two men -- nothing but the brutal truth ; yet this time it was [the old priest]1250-the old priest who held up [his]1250-the old priest hand against a passionate outcry . "[2873-you] Do n't make a fuss . Be brave , at least , and do n't disturb [her]2869-her . [She]2869-her is coming to [herself]2869-her again . " To [herself]0-i certainly . To the old half - amused , half - mysterious smile , as [her]2869-her eyes caught the tapers , the lighted altar beyond , [[her]2869-her lover]475-her lover kneeling at [her]2869-her side . "[2869-her] It is the wedding , [I]0-i suppose , " [she]2869-her said -- there was a catch in [her]2869-her breath now--"but[0-i] why have [they]2874-they put the candles like a bier ? To save time , [I]0-i suppose . But it mixes things up ; and-- " [she]2869-her gave a little impatient sigh--"Oh[2875-he] ! tell [him]2875-he to be quick , [Romeo]99-romeo , for -- for [we]2876-we always meant to be married in the end -- didn't [we]2876-we ? " The words cut [Vincent]71-vincent like a knife . Yes ! [He]2875-he had meant it . Not always . Not till , even to one with [his]2875-he past , the perfection of this idyll in [the garden]433-the garden would have suffered without that promise to [himself]2875-he . And now , death should not cheat [him]2875-he , should not leave a stain , a regret , on the one perfect romance of [his]2875-he life . [He]2875-he stooped suddenly and kissed [her]100-juliet ; kissed [her]100-juliet with more passion than [he]2875-he had ever kissed [her]100-juliet before . "[99-romeo] It wo n't be long , [Juliet]100-juliet ; [he]2875-he is just going to begin , " [he]2875-he whispered , then rose to [his]2875-he feet unsteadily . This at least [he]2875-he could do for [himself]2875-he . And for [her]100-juliet ? A sob , almost of gratitude , of admiration , came to [his]2875-he eyes as [he]2875-he realized that it would never , never -- even if [she]100-juliet had lived -- have mattered to [her]100-juliet really . But it had been a part of the play ; part of [her]100-juliet as [Juliet]100-juliet . So it should be . [His]2875-he wild revolt at the sequence of improbabilities -- for after all that idyll in [the garden]433-the garden had been , bar [its]433-the garden environments , commonplace enough -- which had landed [him]2875-he in -- in an [Adelphi]57-adelphi drama!--(he could not help the thought , though [he]2875-he despised it)--should give way to this . The play should end with a wedding . [Juliet]100-juliet should have the ' statue of pure gold ' in the eyes of [the world]404-the world . [He]2875-he could ensure this by a word ; and the word should be spoken . [The last one]5202-the last one came as a step resounded down [the passage]446-the passage ; [Lance Carlyon]68-lance 's step as [he]68-lance sought the light [he]68-lance had seen -- sought [[his]68-lance Captain]394-his captain . " "[71-vincent] Heard it ! " echoed [Vincent]71-vincent , wildly . "[71-vincent] Yes ! [I]0-i heard it . Go on ! What then ? " "[0-i] [I]0-i do n't know -- [I]0-i know nothing in this infernal nightmare that 's got hold of [us]2891-us all ! " cried [Lance]68-lance . "[71-vincent] [You]71-vincent must go ! " said a stern voice . "[71-vincent] [You]71-vincent must go , [Captain Dering]71-vincent , and prevent worse from befalling ; if [you]71-vincent can -- if [you]71-vincent can ! " There was almost a triumph in [his]81-father ninian voice . [Lance]68-lance looked from one to the other in sheer despair . "[71-vincent] Well ! if [you]71-vincent wo n't come , [I]0-i 'm off -- oh ! come along , [Vincent]71-vincent , and do n't be [a fool]4066-a fool ! [It]2895-it -- it is n't worth it ; it never is ! " [Vincent Dering]71-vincent stood still irresolute .
